title: Direct Response Video Editor for Paid Ads (Meta, TikTok, UGC, D2C Brand)
description:
About Us

Ace & Taylor is a fast-growing D2C e-commerce brand selling premium hair tools across Europe. We focus on high-performing direct response video ads for Meta 
/Instagram) and TikTok.



We work with a creative engine: every week our creators produce raw content, and we test multiple variations to find winners. We are currently active in The Netherlands and Belgium and expanding across Europe.



What You‚Äôll Do (Your Core Responsibility)

You will be our dedicated Video Editor for performance ads. Your job is to turn raw creator content into multiple high-converting ad variations for Meta & TikTok on a weekly basis.



This is NOT basic video editing.

We are looking for someone who understands direct response marketing and knows how to edit videos that convert.



Your Weekly Tasks

- Edit 5‚Äì15 short-form ad videos per week (UGC + lifestyle + product demos)

- Create multiple variations from the same raw footage (different hooks, captions, pacing, first 3 seconds, CTAs)

- Add subtitles optimized for TikTok & Meta (fast, bold, attention-grabbing)

- Cut for retention: strong hooks in the first 1‚Äì3 seconds

- Follow our creative briefs, examples, and SOP

- Deliver on time every week

- Implement feedback and iterate on winning creatives

- Organize files properly (naming, folders, versions)



We Are Looking For Someone Who

- Has experience editing direct response / performance ads

- Understands how ads work on Meta & TikTok (hooks, pacing, scroll-stopping edits)

- Is detail-oriented and follows instructions carefully

- Is proactive: asks questions if something is unclear

- Can work independently once the SOP is clear

- Can handle weekly production without reminders



Important

We work fast and test a lot of creatives.

If you:

- Miss deadlines

- Don‚Äôt follow instructions

- Don‚Äôt ask questions when confused

- Or deliver inconsistent quality



This will clearly not be a fit.



Paid Test Task (Mandatory)

Before we hire you, we will ask you to complete a small paid test assignment (1‚Äì2 short ad videos) based on real raw footage and a clear briefing.

This helps both sides see if we‚Äôre a good match.



Long-Term Opportunity

If this works well, this can become a long-term collaboration with consistent weekly work, growth in responsibility, and higher pay over time.

title: Social Media Manager (Instagram & TikTok) for Ace & Taylor
description:
About Us

Ace & Taylor is a fast-growing D2C e-commerce brand selling premium hair tools across Europe. We focus on high-performing short-form video content and daily organic posting on Instagram and TikTok to grow brand awareness, trust, and sales.



We are currently active in The Netherlands and Belgium and expanding across Europe.



What You‚Äôll Do (Your Core Responsibility)

You will fully own our organic social media presence on Instagram and TikTok.

This means you are responsible for planning, posting, captions, stories, community management (DMs & comments), and daily execution.



This is NOT just scheduling content.

We are looking for someone who can run our social media channels independently and consistently.



Your Weekly Tasks

- Post 1‚Äì2 times per day on Instagram & TikTok

- Create strong captions & CTAs (engaging, on-brand, conversion-focused)

- Post daily stories (product usage, UGC, behind the scenes, promos)

- Reply to DMs & comments within 24 hours

- Plan and manage the content calendar

- Repurpose existing videos into social posts

- Coordinate with video editors & creative team

- Track basic performance (views, engagement) and report weekly



We Are Looking For Someone Who

- Has proven experience managing Instagram & TikTok for brands

- Understands short-form content and social media trends

- Can work independently without daily hand-holding

- Is proactive: asks questions if something is unclear

- Is highly organized and consistent with daily posting

- Understands brand tone and can adapt copy per platform



Important (Read Carefully ‚Äì This Filters Out 90% of Bad Applicants)

We post daily. This role requires consistency and ownership.

If you:

- Miss posting deadlines

- Are inconsistent

- Don‚Äôt reply to DMs/comments on time

- Don‚Äôt ask questions when confused

- Or treat this as ‚Äújust scheduling posts‚Äù



This will clearly not be a fit.



Paid Test Task (Mandatory)

Before we hire you, we will ask you to complete a paid test task:

- Create a 7-day content plan

- Write captions for 5 posts

- Propose story ideas

This helps both sides see if we‚Äôre a good match.



Long-Term Opportunity

If this works well, this can become a long-term collaboration with consistent work, growing responsibility, and higher pay over time.

title: School Outreach Caller (UK Primary Schools)
description:
About Us



Kings & Queens Chess is a UK-based education company that runs after-school chess clubs in primary schools. We work closely with schools to deliver engaging, structured, and enjoyable chess sessions for children.



The Role



We‚Äôre looking for a confident, friendly, English-speaking caller to contact UK primary schools and introduce our after-school chess clubs. Your role is to speak with school offices, identify the correct contact person, share basic information, and pass interested schools to our management team for follow-up.



This is not a hard sales role ‚Äî the focus is polite outreach, relationship-building, and lead generation.



Key Responsibilities



- Call UK primary schools during UK school hours (09:00 to 15:00 GMT)

- Speak politely and professionally with school office staff

- Introduce Kings & Queens Chess and our chess clubs (script will be provided)

- Share headline information (session format, general pricing, flexibility)

- Log call outcomes accurately in a spreadsheet or CRM

- Escalate interested schools to management for follow-up



What We‚Äôre Looking For



- Excellent spoken and written English

- A calm, friendly, and professional phone manner

- Previous calling, virtual assistant, or admin experience preferred

- Comfortable speaking with schools and education professionals

- Reliable, organised, and detail-oriented

- Able to follow scripts and guidelines closely



Hours & Pay



- Hours aligned with UK school hours

- Starting at ?220 per hour, depending on experience

- Opportunity for additional bonuses based on performance



How to Apply



Please include:



- A short introduction about yourself

- Any previous calling or outreach experience

- A brief example of how you would introduce our service to a UK primary school.

title: Parking Operation Manager
description:
PARKING OPERATIONS MANAGER



Location: Remote

Employment Type: Full-Time



ABOUT VERTEX FLEET



Vertex Fleet is a leading national truck parking and real estate network, specializing in outdoor industrial storage (IOS). We address the critical truck parking shortage across the United States by offering secure, accessible, and strategically located parking solutions for the freight and logistics industry. With an aggressive expansion strategy targeting 100 locations nationwide, Vertex Fleet is revolutionizing the IOS and fleet parking industry through cutting-edge technology, innovative business practices, and unparalleled customer service.



Our facilities provide 24/7 security, commercial-grade lighting, perimeter fencing, and convenient access to major transportation arteries, serving trucking companies, drivers, and fleet managers across the country.



POSITION OVERVIEW



We are seeking a dynamic and results-oriented Parking Operations Manager to join our rapidly growing team in a fully remote capacity. This role is pivotal to our national expansion, combining business development, partnership management, operational oversight, and team development. The ideal candidate will excel at building relationships with facility owners, promoting our innovative parking platform system, supporting B2B sales efforts, and elevating our team's operational excellence and customer service capabilities.



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES



Real Estate Partnership Development

‚Ä¢ Build and cultivate strong relationships with industrial outdoor storage property owners and real estate partners nationwide

‚Ä¢ Identify and pursue opportunities to acquire or lease new IOS locations to support our 100-location expansion goal

‚Ä¢ Negotiate partnership agreements, lease terms, and acquisition deals



B2B Sales & Customer Support

‚Ä¢ Assist team members in preparing accurate and competitive quotations for B2B customers (trucking companies, fleet managers, logistics operations)

‚Ä¢ Review pricing proposals to ensure alignment with company standards and market positioning

‚Ä¢ Support the sales process for daily, monthly, and long-term parking contracts

‚Ä¢ Maintain detailed records of B2B customer interactions, requirements, and contract terms

‚Ä¢ Develop strategies to convert leads into long-term fleet partnerships



Daily Operations Management & Oversight

‚Ä¢ Manage remote employees responsible for monitoring parking space occupancy across multiple locations

‚Ä¢ Ensure accurate, real-time tracking of occupied spaces and available capacity at all facilities

‚Ä¢ Implement efficient processes and systems for daily operational tasks and reporting

‚Ä¢ Monitor key performance indicators including occupancy rates, utilization, and revenue metrics

‚Ä¢ Troubleshoot operational issues and implement corrective actions swiftly

‚Ä¢ Coordinate with on-site managers at various Vertex Fleet locations

‚Ä¢ Ensure compliance with security protocols and facility standards across all sites



Team Development & Customer Service Excellence

‚Ä¢ Provide comprehensive customer service training to all team members

‚Ä¢ Develop and deliver training programs specifically designed to improve employees' communication and speaking skills

‚Ä¢ Create training materials, scripts, and standard operating procedures for customer interactions

‚Ä¢ Conduct regular coaching sessions and role-playing exercises to enhance service quality

‚Ä¢ Evaluate employee performance through call monitoring, metrics review, and constructive feedback

‚Ä¢ Foster a culture of exceptional customer service that reflects Vertex Fleet's commitment to the trucking industry

‚Ä¢ Implement continuous improvement initiatives to elevate team performance



Technology & Platform Management

‚Ä¢ Utilize and optimize Vertex Fleet's proprietary parking platform system

‚Ä¢ Ensure team members are proficient in using technology tools for reservations, tracking, and reporting

‚Ä¢ Provide feedback to leadership on platform improvements and operational efficiency enhancements

‚Ä¢ Support the implementation of innovative technology solutions in line with company goals



REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS



‚Ä¢ Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Operations Management, Real Estate, Logistics, or related field (or equivalent experience)

‚Ä¢ Minimum 3-5 years of experience in operations management, preferably in parking, logistics, transportation, real estate, or property management

‚Ä¢ Proven track record in business development, relationship building, and partnership management

‚Ä¢ Strong experience in B2B customer service and sales support

‚Ä¢ Excellent verbal and written communication skills with the ability to train others effectively

‚Ä¢ Demonstrated ability to manage remote teams and coordinate across multiple locations

‚Ä¢ Proficiency in CRM systems, property management software, and operational platforms

‚Ä¢ Strong organizational skills with exceptional attention to detail

‚Ä¢ Self-motivated and able to work independently in a remote environment

‚Ä¢ Comfortable with technology and learning new platforms quickly



PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS



‚Ä¢ Experience in the trucking, logistics, or freight industry

‚Ä¢ Background in industrial outdoor storage, fleet management, or truck parking operations

‚Ä¢ Knowledge of the commercial real estate market and lease negotiations

‚Ä¢ Experience with training and development or adult education methodologies

‚Ä¢ Familiarity with parking management systems or reservation platforms

‚Ä¢ Understanding of the truck parking crisis and industry challenges

‚Ä¢ Bilingual (English/Spanish) is a plus



KEY COMPETENCIES



‚Ä¢ Relationship Building: Natural ability to establish trust with property owners, partners, and industry stakeholders

‚Ä¢ Sales Acumen: Understanding of B2B sales cycles and value-based selling

‚Ä¢ Operational Excellence: Commitment to efficiency, accuracy, and continuous improvement

‚Ä¢ Training & Coaching: Skill in developing others and improving team performance

‚Ä¢ Communication: Exceptional speaking, presentation, and interpersonal abilities

‚Ä¢ Problem-Solving: Quick thinking and effective resolution of operational challenges

‚Ä¢ Industry Knowledge: Understanding of trucking, logistics, and fleet operations

‚Ä¢ Technology Proficiency: Comfortable with multiple software platforms and digital tools

‚Ä¢ Remote Work Success: Highly organized, self-directed, and results-focused

‚Ä¢ Customer-Centric: Deep commitment to exceptional service for drivers and fleet managers



PERFORMANCE METRICS



‚Ä¢ Successfully onboard new real estate partners and IOS locations

‚Ä¢ Achieve occupancy and utilization targets across managed facilities

‚Ä¢ Maintain high customer satisfaction scores from B2B fleet partners

‚Ä¢ Ensure accuracy in space availability reporting (minimal discrepancies)

‚Ä¢ Demonstrate measurable improvement in team communication and customer service scores

‚Ä¢ Meet business development targets for partnership acquisitions and platform promotion

‚Ä¢ Reduce operational issues and increase efficiency metrics



WHAT WE OFFER



‚Ä¢ Fully remote work environment with flexibility

‚Ä¢ Competitive salary commensurate with experience

‚Ä¢ Performance-based incentives and bonuses

‚Ä¢ Comprehensive benefits package

‚Ä¢ Professional development and growth opportunities

‚Ä¢ Be part of a rapidly expanding company revolutionizing the truck parking industry

‚Ä¢ Opportunity to make a significant impact on solving America's truck parking crisis

‚Ä¢ Collaborative, innovative, and mission-driven team culture

‚Ä¢ Direct involvement in a high-growth phase of the company's national expansion



WHY JOIN VERTEX FLEET?



At Vertex Fleet, you'll be joining a company at the forefront of solving one of the trucking industry's most critical challenges. We're not just managing parking lots‚Äîwe're building a nationwide network that keeps America's supply chain moving. title: YouTube Video Editor
description:
I am looking for an experienced video editor to collaborate on a weekly YouTube series centered on elevated, short-form documentary-style storytelling. This is not typical fast-paced, trend-driven YouTube content. The goal is to create thoughtful, high-quality nonfiction episodes that feel intelligent, polished, and cohesive while still being optimized for growth and engagement on the platform.

The right person will understand both narrative structure and YouTube performance. You should know how to shape compelling episodes of a docu-series, weaving together talking-to-camera footage with archival clips, photographs, graphics, and other supporting visuals in a way that feels seamless and purposeful. Strong pacing, clarity of storytelling, and an instinct for retention are essential. I‚Äôm looking for someone who can help craft episodes that feel elevated and cinematic, but still distinctly ‚ÄúYouTube‚Äù in their accessibility and rhythm.

This role requires confidence in sourcing and integrating external media. You should be familiar with reputable stock libraries and archival resources, understand where to find high-quality images and video, and know how to properly incorporate material pulled from platforms like YouTube when appropriate. A working understanding of licensing and fair use principles is important. In addition to editing, you should be comfortable creating clean, professional graphics, lower thirds, and other visual elements that enhance the storytelling without overwhelming it.

Prior experience is required. Please be prepared to share links to videos you have worked on, ideally documentary-style or nonfiction projects for YouTube or similar platforms. You should be able to clearly explain your role in each project and describe the creative or editorial decisions you contributed to the final product.

This is intended to be an ongoing collaboration. I am seeking a reliable partner who can commit between approximately five and 20 hours per week, depending on production needs. The schedule is flexible, but consistency is essential, as episodes will be produced on a weekly basis. Clear communication, dependability, and a shared commitment to quality matter greatly.

If you are someone who values smart storytelling, understands YouTube strategy, and wants to help build a distinctive and ambitious docu-series over time, I would love to hear from you.

title: FUNNELBUILDER (Funnelish)
description:
About Us:

We are a fast-growing e-commerce company specializing in funnel-driven dropshipping, focused on building highly optimized, conversion-focused sales funnels at scale. Our success depends on operational excellence, strong testing systems, and skilled funnel builders who understand both the technical and strategic side of funnel performance. As part of our team, you will work alongside experienced funnel builders in a high-performance environment where results are recognized and rewarded.



Job Description:

We are looking for a Funnel Builder who will be responsible for building, maintaining, and optimizing high-converting funnels across our funnel ecosystem. In this role, you will not only execute funnel builds but also actively contribute insights, improvements, and strategic input based on performance data, product understanding, and conversion best practices. You will work in a fast-paced testing environment where precision, ownership, and performance-driven thinking are essential.



Responsibilities:



Funnel Creation & Implementation:

You will build and launch complete funnels based on internal SOPs, product requirements, and campaign strategies, ensuring technical accuracy and full functionality from start to finish.



Quality Control & Testing:

You will thoroughly test all funnels you build, ensuring that pages, links, integrations, checkout flows, and tracking systems work flawlessly.



Conversion-Focused Execution:

You will apply your understanding of copy structure, offer positioning, and funnel logic to ensure that each funnel is optimized for maximum conversion performance.



Product & Copy Understanding:

You will study the product, the offer, and the intended customer journey to ensure the funnel structure aligns with the marketing message and campaign goals.



Performance Contribution & Insights:

You will provide feedback, suggestions, and improvement ideas based on your experience, helping refine templates, layouts, and funnel systems over time.



Collaboration & SOP Compliance:

You will work closely with the store management and funnel teams, following internal SOPs while maintaining high professional standards and operational consistency.



Requirements:



Experience:

Proven experience building sales funnels (Funnelish, Shopify-based funnels, ClickFunnels, or similar platforms preferred).



Technical Accuracy & Attention to Detail:

Strong ability to ensure flawless technical setup, integrations, and user flow functionality.



Conversion Awareness:

Understanding of basic copy structure, conversion principles, and funnel psychology is required.



Ownership & Professionalism:

Highly professional, reliable, and capable of taking full ownership of the funnels you build.



Proactive & Insight-Driven:

Ability to think independently, provide improvement ideas, and contribute strategically rather than only executing instructions.



Language:

Fluent in English, both written and spoken.



What We Offer:



A high-performance remote working environment with a team of experienced funnel builders.

Competitive base compensation combined with a performance-based bonus system, where builders who consistently create winning funnels can earn substantial monthly bonuses.

The opportunity to significantly increase your earnings based on measurable performance and KPI achievement.

A collaborative environment where funnel builders continuously learn from each other and improve together.

Long-term growth opportunities within a rapidly scaling e-commerce organization.

title: Executive Assistant (Virtual)
description:
Requirements: Executive Assistant (Personal) Virtual

Required Schedule: Monday to Saturday - 10am to 8pm. 

Type: Full Time (No to multiple clients (Juggling).



ABOUT ME:

------------------------------------------
. I am Half Japanese and half Filipino. I speak fluent Tagalog and English. However, I easily adjust to who I talk to. It is important to know, though, that Reading and writing in English are both separate skills. More on that later on. We can communicate in Tagalog or English. Usually, in
s, I prefer proper English.



2. I am a workaholic. My schedule is hectic, and I have many responsibilities. My current assistant will leave after three years of working with me to pursue her path. She has been excellent in fulfilling her duties and responsibilities. I also found her here on this platform. 



3. Time is very important to me. I want to add more time and reduce my workload. I want to spend more time with my family when I go home every day. Most of the tasks are personally related. Task-intensive, yes, because there are a lot of small tasks like calls, messages, and research. I value the time that much. I don't want to get sidelined and distracted with my day to day tasks. 



4. I am a technology-oriented person. You will be introduced to many tools you have probably not heard of before (win-win). Security is another factor. I will try our relationship first before introducing myself further.



5. I am more available at night after a busy day's work. I am still trying to assess our workflow. It is more of a let's see what works, and let us communicate properly on how you want things. Usually, I would reply in the morning, and of course reply during the day if a concern is there but if we come to an arrangement wherein we can review the day or plan the next tasks after 7pm or if you are still awake by 10pm then that would be really good.



6. Since I am busy, I can be flexible. Maybe there will be some weekdays when I won't need you, or we can transfer it to a Saturday or Sunday.



Disclaimer: I am not sure if my job description is really the industry standard, but what I can say is I do not need a highly skilled VA in terms of Wordpress or Marketing. I want someone who is very good with Research and Communication. This is just a heads-up before moving to the next points.



REQUISITES:

1. Proper English (Reading & Writing)

2. Mobile Phone (I will provide your own, postpaid number & etc). 

3. Laptop or Desktop PC (I will provide your own)

4. Speed Test of your internet ( I will assess this)

5. Typing Test (Words per minute, I use Type Racer)

5. Good Communication Skills (This is just my preference, but if you communicate with (....Hello po) and like that, I will ask you to change and improve on that part. Proper punctuation, spelling, and sentence construction will be appreciated.)

6. Good Logic and Analytical Skills

7. Reading between the lines. (Context of Clues)

8. Advance notice is critical to me. I plan my tasks obsessively and schedule my life based on Time. As mentioned, I treat it like I treat it with money.

9. Loyalty and Trust.

10. I hope you don't mind me messaging you early in the morning or very late at night (mute it) since there are times that I create messages or instructions at these times.

11. It would be a plus BUT NOT MANDATORY if you are in the Apple ecosystem (iPhone)



MAJOR JOB DESCRIPTION:

1. Monitors and Updates my purchases.

2. Set Appointments (Meetings, Doctors, and other scheduled activities).

3. Manage my
s, purchases, inquiries, research, returns, and everything included.

4. Purchase on my behalf (I am still researching how to authorize purchases without actually giving out my personal credit card information)

5. Research (Must be excellent). For example: Give me a list of Five-star restaurants, etc.



MINOR:

1. Writing

2. Compilation of Articles (Connected to Research)

3. Contact this person on behalf of me.

4. Transcribing



BENEFITS & INCLUSIONS:

1. Payroll will be done weekly every Friday. 

2. Of course, overtime will be paid.

3. I'll give you all the tools with licenses and everything for you to do your work. As mentioned, I value time with the same value as money.

4. I will give you YouTube Premium and Spotify if you want.

5. Training and guidance will be provided.

6. If we are successful for months and have established trust with our partnership, I will provide you with equipment such as a Laptop or Desktop, Webcam, and headset.

8. I am willing to teach and train. We are both investing (Win-win)





TOOLS:

- I am a very technical person. All software, tools needed will be provided. Here are some of the tools that are usually part of my toolbox. This doesn't mean that you will use all of these tools. Just wanted to lay it out there just in case you are familiar. I will be putting a (#) hashtag after a number if it is a major requirement. Expect to be assessed on these things if you are familiar.



OFFICE SUITES:

1. Google Workspace (Chrome, Docs, Sheets, Slides, Drive, Gmail)

2. Office 365 (Edge, Word, Excel, Powerpoint)



COMMUNICATION TOOLS:

1. Slack

2. Zoom

5. Viber

6. WhatsApp



DOCUMENTATION:

STORAGE

title: Bookkeeping & Maintenance Coordination Virtual Assistant
description:
COMPANY OVERVIEW

Oodahost is an innovative short-term rental management company that leverages technology and transparent processes to deliver exceptional results for homeowners. We pride ourselves on efficiency, reliability, and excellent customer service. Join our growing, fully remote team to help streamline operations and enhance our homeowners‚Äô experience.



POSITION SUMMARY

We‚Äôre looking for a versatile Virtual Assistant with strong bookkeeping skills and maintenance coordination experience. You will keep our financials accurate and up-to-date while ensuring property repairs and vendor communication run smoothly. You will also handle small purchasing tasks, helping procure items needed for property operations.



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

BOOKKEEPING & FINANCIAL MANAGEMENT Track invoices, expenses, and transactions using QuickBooks (or similar software). Reconcile payouts, monitor homeowner statements, and prepare monthly financial reports. Verify payments and invoices for accuracy and flag any discrepancies promptly.



MAINTENANCE COORDINATION Communicate with vendors and contractors for routine or emergency repairs. Schedule and oversee maintenance tasks to minimize guest disruptions. Log maintenance requests, track progress, and update internal systems. Coordinate with the operations team to ensure timely and cost-effective resolutions.



SMALL PURCHASING & PROCUREMENT Identify and order necessary supplies or replacement items for properties such as linens, cleaning supplies, or minor furnishings. Compare prices, negotiate with suppliers, and track deliveries. Maintain organized records of purchased items, costs, and shipping details.



QUALIFICATIONS & SKILLS

Proven Bookkeeping Experience Knowledge of QuickBooks, Xero, or other accounting software, along with basic accounting principles and financial reporting.



Maintenance Coordination Experience Ability to prioritize repair requests and coordinate multiple vendor schedules. Experience logging maintenance issues and following up until resolution.



Strong Attention to Detail Ensuring accurate data entry, invoice matching, and consistent record-keeping.



Excellent Communication Skills (English) Comfortable liaising with vendors, homeowners, and tea
mbers via
, phone, and chat.



Organized & Self-Motivated Capable of managing multiple tasks with minimal supervision.



Tech-Savvy Familiarity with task management tools (for example, ClickUp or Trello) and cloud-based document sharing.



Flexible Availability Able to adapt to different time zones and occasionally address urgent requests on short notice.



WHY JOIN OODAHOST?

Growth & Learning We invest in training and development, offering continuous opportunities to expand your skill set.



Remote Culture Work from the comfort of your home, collaborating with a global team that values open communication and productivity.



Impactful Role You will have a direct influence on our homeowners‚Äô satisfaction by keeping finances accurate and ensuring quick, efficient maintenance solutions.



Competitive Compensation We offer fair, market-aligned rates commensurate with experience and contributions.

title: Content Writing VA (Audience Engagement)
description:
[Caution]

We are continuously expanding our brand's reach and are looking for a writer who can build genuine connections with our audience.



If you believe that great content is about building trust, fostering community, and providing immense value, this role will be a great fit. This position requires deep empathy, exceptional storytelling skills, and a genuine interest in helping our audience solve their problems. You will be responsible for shaping our brand's voice and authority from the ground up.



If you view content as simply a numbers game of ranking keywords and driving quick sales, this role may be a challenge for you. Only read further if you‚Äôre passionate about creating content that educates, inspires, and builds lasting relationships with an audience that trusts what we say and believes in what we do.



[Job Title]

Content Writing VA (Trust-Building & Audience Engagement)



[Work Type]

Remote | Flexible Hours | Long-term Contract



[Base Payment]

We offer a project-based compensation structure for those who apply as part-time. That said, the expected monthly range is $
USD (for full-time workers), depending on factors such as proficiency, workload, task complexity, performance (including bonuses), experience, skill set, and the final scope of responsibilities.



[Bonus]

There's potential for a performance-based bonus tied to the quality of your content and its impact on audience trust. Metrics could include audience engagement, content-driven community growth, and positive feedback. We'll go over those details once you've demonstrated your skills, but you should be comfortable working with just the base pay initially.



[What You‚Äôll Be Doing]



Your role is to be the voice of our brand, building a bridge of trust between us and our audience. You will be responsible for the end-to-end content creation process, ensuring every piece is valuable, credible, and engaging. Your main tasks will include:



a) Empathetic & In-Depth Research: Going beyond surface-level data to deeply understand our audience's pain points, desires, and values, and sourcing credible, authoritative information to build a foundation of trust in every piece of content.



b) Strategic & Trust-Focused Content Planning: Brainstorming and developing content ideas and narratives that prioritize educating and helping the audience over direct selling. You will help create a content plan that ensures a consistent and reliable brand voice.



c) Rhetorical & Persuasive Content Creation: Weaving compelling stories and using rhetorical skills to create memorable, relatable content that fosters a strong emotional connection with our audience. Your writing will be clear, concise, and accurate to project professionalism and build credibility.



d) Human-Centric SEO Optimization: Creating content that genuinely answers the questions people are searching for. You'll use your expertise in on-page SEO (headlines, meta descriptions, internal linking) to help our valuable content get discovered by the right people.



e) Meticulous Editing & Proofreading: Polishing every piece of content to eliminate any errors that could undermine our credibility. You will adhere to our style guide to maintain a unified and trustworthy brand voice.



f) Insightful Performance Analysis: Focusing on engagement metrics that truly matter (like time on page, comment quality, and share rates) to understand what resonates with our audience and using that data to make our content strategy even better.



g) Authentic Community Engagement: Interacting with our audience in comments and on social media in a helpful and genuine way. You will listen to their feedback and questions to inform future content, showing them their voice is heard and valued.



[Goal]

As we grow, our ultimate goal is to build a loyal community that trusts our brand implicitly. By creating a foundation of exceptionally valuable, empathetic, and credible content, you will not only attract an audience but also turn them into advocates. Your work will be critical in establishing our brand as a leading authority in our field.



[What We‚Äôre Looking For]

The ideal candidate:



a) Has Proven Content Writing Experience: You have a strong portfolio of work (blog posts, video scripts, etc.) that demonstrates your ability to research topics thoroughly, write persuasively, and build a connection with an audience.



b) Possesses High Emotional Intelligence: You are empathetic and can easily put yourself in the audience's shoes. You understand how to use tone and language to create content that resonates on a personal level.



c) Is an Exceptional Storyteller & Communicator: You are meticulous in your research and can transform complex information into clear, compelling, and easy-to-read content. You are proactive and professional in your communications.



d) Has a Trust-First Mentality: You believe that the primary goal of content is to provide value and build a relationship. You are passionate about creating content that helps people and represents our company's values authentically.



e) Is Proficient with Content & SEO Tools: You are skilled in using tools for research, writing, and basic SEO (e.g., Google Docs, Grammarly, keyword research tools).



f) Communicates with Clarity and Values Respect: You are reliable, accountable, and can articulate your thoughts in a clear, logical manner.



Important Note:

We value respectful communication. What does it mean? Most importantly, if you need to step away, just let me or your manager know why and when. We understand it, even if you need to leave tomorrow, BUT ghosting is the last thing you'd like to do, since it causes confusion and delays. In everyday conversations, our team thrives on mutual respect, no matter your role.



[Why Work With Us?]



Flexible hours to suit your lifestyle.



The opportunity to be a foundational builder of our brand‚Äôs voice and authority.



Long-term growth opportunities as our company scales.



A supportive environment where your creativity and writing skills are highly valued.



[About Us]

We are a growing team dedicated to achieving our goals through a culture of collaboration and mutual support. We believe that our success is a direct result of our team's well-being and that a positive environment is essential for creating outstanding work. Your role is absolutely critical to building a trusted relationship with the people we serve.



[How to Apply]

Subject Line: Start your title with either "Content Writing VA", or your application can't be considered.



In your application, include:



1) Please share ONLY one or two works you‚Äôre most proud of RATHER THAN including all past project, as time is limited.



2) Trust-Building Showcase: Walk me through a piece of content you've written that you feel was particularly successful in building trust with its audience. What was your thought process from ideation to the final draft, and how did you measure its impact beyond simple metrics?



3) Handling Criticism & Growth: Describe a time you received significant negative feedback on a piece of content you wrote. How did you handle the feedback, what did you learn from it, and how did it influence your approach to writing moving forward?



4) Strategic Challenge: Imagine our brand is facing some skepticism in the market about a new product or service. How would you develop a content strategy to address this skepticism and rebuild trust with our audience? What are the key ethical considerations you would keep in mind?



5) Ethical Persuasion: How would you explain the difference between 'persuasion' and 'manipulation' in copywriting? Can you provide an example from your own work where you consciously chose a persuasive, rather than manipulative, approach?



6) Preferred Tool Stack: What are your go-to tools for research, writing, editing, and SEO? Please mention why you prefer them.



7) AI in Your Workflow: Explain where and how you use AI to improve your content creation productivity (e.g., for research, brainstorming, editing), and where you deliberately choose not to rely on AI to preserve authenticity and trust. (We expect you aren't using AI to answer these questions, as they will be discussed further in an interview.)



8) Available Hours: Let us know your general availability (e.g., "Approximately 20 hours per week, mostly flexible between 1PM - 8PM on Monday, 3 PM - 10PM on Tuesday, 12PM - 8PM on Wednesday, ...,  in Philippines time").



9) Available Period of Work: Let us know for how long you expect to work with us. We'd prefer at least 6 months with opportunities for extension.



10) Willingness for Zoo
etings: Confirm that you're willing to participate in occasional Zoo
etings for team alignment and check-ins.



I will respond to all applications within 7-15 days.

We look forward to hearing from you..

title: Project Lead ‚Äì IT / Tech Projects
description:
About Digibeacon, the premier ClickUp Solutions Partner in the Philippines, is looking for a Project Lead who will run and execute IT and technology projects hands-on. This role is customer-facing and requires someone who can architect, configure, and implement project management dashboards, reports, and productivity tools‚Äîincluding ClickUp and related platforms.



This is a delivery-focused role where you will be actively involved in project scoping, configuration, client sessions, and end-to-end implementation.



Role Overview

The Project Lead will work directly with clients and internal teams to ensure that each project is delivered according to requirements. You will be responsible for hands-on configuration, workflow setup, dashboard creation, and ensuring that clients adopt and understand the systems built for them. PMP certification is an advantage but not required.



What You‚Äôll Do

1. Lead and execute multiple IT/tech projects simultaneously.

2. Work directly with clients to gather requirements and translate them into workflows, dashboards, process diagrams and reports.

3. Architect and configure project management spaces, structures, and tools (primarily ClickUp).

4. Build dashboards, reporting views, automations, custom fields, forms, and project templates.

5. Conduct client workshops, onboarding sessions, and training.

6. Prepare project documentation including process maps, SOPs, and implementation guides.

7. Coordinate timelines, deliverables, and dependencies across teams.

9. Track project progress and ensure timely completion of milestones.

Qualifications

1. 2‚Äì4 years of experience managing or implementing IT, SaaS, or tech-related projects.

2. Strong hands-on experience with project management tools (ClickUp and other similar Project management tools).

3. Ability to design workflows, dashboards, automations, and structured project setups.

4. Excellent communication skills and confidence in client-facing sessions.

5. Strong organizational skills, problem-solving ability, and a ‚Äúcan-do‚Äù attitude.

6. Experience in process mapping, diagram or SOP creation is a strong advantage.

7. PMP or similar certifications are a plus, but not required. 



What You‚Äôll Need

2. A quiet home workspace

Why Join Digibeacon?

.com/digibeaconcareers

mbers accountable

title: Sales Representative
description:
When applying - Please include resume and a video cover letter with the following details:

1. Why you think you would be a good fit for this role

2. Share a story about a past sale that demonstrates your soft-sales skills

3. Perform a mock-role play where you show how you would build trust with the customer and find out their pain points. **Bonus if you can show more traits based on the key responsibilities below.



Also include the following:

Screenshot of your typing test results - 



Position Summary



We are a residential house cleaning company looking for a soft sales specialist. As a Soft Sales Specialist, you will be responsible for engaging potential clients in meaningful conversations to understand their cleaning needs and subtly guide them toward our services. This role emphasizes soft selling techniques, where the focus is on building trust, active listening, and relating to customers rather than high-pressure tactics. Drawing from principles in listening-based sales methodologies, you will prioritize empathy, mutual understanding, and tailored solutions to foster long-term client relationships.



Key Responsibilities



Initiate and conduct inbound/outbound calls,
s, with prospective clients to discuss their house cleaning requirements.

Employ active listening techniques to fully comprehend customer concerns, preferences, and pain points, such as acknowledging their needs, and providing empathetic responses.

Build rapport by relating to clients on a personal level, demonstrating genuine interest in their situations, and offering value-driven insights without aggressive promotion.

Use subtle selling strategies to highlight how our services align with the client's specific needs, focusing on benefits like time savings, health improvements, and customized cleaning plans.

Follow up on leads with intentional engagement, asking open-ended questions to encourage dialogue and uncover opportunities for service recommendations.

Maintain accurate records of interactions in our CRM system and track conversion metrics to refine approaches based on customer feedback.

Collaborate with the operations team to ensure seamless service delivery post-sale, reinforcing client satisfaction and loyalty.



Required Qualifications and Skills



Proven experience in sales, preferably in a service-based industry such as home services, hospitality, or customer support, with a track record of success in soft selling environments.

Strong proficiency in active listening, including the ability to engage intentionally, avoid interruptions, and provide tailored responses that reflect understanding of the customer's perspective.

Excellent relational skills, with a natural aptitude for empathy, building trust, and connecting emotionally with diverse clients.

Familiarity with listening-based sales principles, such as those taught in active listening sales courses (e.g., techniques for reading buyer cues, enhancing communication through acknowledgment, and transforming conversations into collaborative problem-solving).

Exceptional verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to ask insightful questions and adapt messaging to individual client needs.

High school diploma or equivalent; additional certifications in sales or customer service are advantageous.

Proficiency in basic CRM tools and Microsoft Office suite.

Ability to work independently in a remote or hybrid environment, with flexibility for occasional on-site client meetings.



Preferred Attributes



Enthusiasm for the home services sector and a commitment to promoting sustainable, client-centered solutions.

Resilience in handling objections through patient, non-confrontational dialogue.

A results-oriented mindset balanced with a focus on ethical, low-pressure sales practices.

title: Outbound Sales Representative (B2B ‚Äì Accounting Industry)
description:
Flowvate is recruiting a dedicated Outbound Sales Representative on behalf of a growing accounting firm based in Ottawa, Canada. This role is focused exclusively on outbound prospecting. The successful candidate will be responsible for identifying, contacting, and qualifying business owners in Ontario and booking discovery calls for the firm‚Äôs partners. This is a performance-driven role with hourly compensation plus commission incentives tied directly to results.



Key Responsibilities

Build targeted lead lists using tools such as Google Maps, Apollo, and industry directories. Conduct consistent outbound calls to business owners and decision makers. Qualify prospects based on defined criteria. Schedule discovery calls for the firm‚Äôs partners. Maintain accurate records in CRM or tracking systems. Conduct follow-up calls as needed. Provide weekly performance reporting. You will not be responsible for closing sales. Your focus is booking qualified appointments.



Qualifications

Strong spoken English with clear pronunciation. Prior cold calling or outbound B2B sales experience is essential. Confident speaking with business owners and decision makers. Comfortable handling objections and rejection. Self-motivated and results-driven. Reliable high-speed internet connection and professional headset. Available to work full-time hours aligned with Eastern Time.



Performance Expectations

This is a structured outbound program with daily activity targets, weekly KPI reviews, and ongoing script refinement. The role requires discipline, consistency, and professionalism.



Required Application Materials

To be considered, applicants must submit a voice recording explaining why they are a strong fit for an outbound sales role. Applicants must also submit a voice recording reading the following script clearly and confidently: ‚ÄúHi, quick question ‚Äî are you the person who handles accounting decisions for your company? We specialize in helping Ottawa-based businesses reduce tax stress and improve bookkeeping efficiency. I‚Äôm not selling anything right now ‚Äî I just wanted to see if you would be open to a short introductory call with the partner.‚Äù Applications submitted without voice recordings will not be reviewed.



Flowvate connects growing companies with high-performing remote professionals. We focus on structured systems, measurable results, and long-term partnerships. If you are disciplined, comfortable on the phone, and motivated by performance-based incentives, we encourage you to apply.

title: Property Management Contracts and Proposals Specialist
description:
The Contracts and Proposals Specialist supports the Business Development team by preparing, reviewing, coordinating, and managing contracts and business proposals related to properties, owners, and real estate services. This role will work closely with internal teams to ensure all contracts and proposals are accurate, compliant, and aligned with company and regulatory standards. The position is fully remote and requires strong attention to detail, organization, and deadline management. 

This role also requires a higher degree of independent ownership across contract tracking, renewals, amendments, and cross-functional coordination



Responsibilities: 



Contracts Management: 

- Draft, review, and revise contracts such as property management agreements, and service contracts, lease-related addendums, NDAs, and amendments. 

- Ensure contracts comply with company policies, local real estate regulations, and property-specific requirements. 

- Coordinate contract reviews and approvals with Legal and leadership. 

- Track contract terms, renewals, expirations, and key obligations for managed properties. 

- Maintain organized digital contract files and contract trackers. 



Proposals: 

- Collaborate with Business Development Specialist to gather scope of work, pricing, and supporting documentation. 

- Customize proposals for property owners, HOAs, and commercial or residential clients. 

- Ensure proposals meet client requirements and submission deadlines. 



Real Estate and Property Operations Support: 

- Coordinate with internal teams on contract-related billing terms and service scopes. 

- Maintain proposal templates, contract templates, and content libraries specific to property management. 



Cross-Functional Coordination: 

- Serve as the primary point of contact for contract and proposal-related inquiries. 

- Provide regular status updates on contracts and proposals to internal stakeholders. 

- Identify opportunities to improve contract and proposal workflows. 



Compliance and Documentation: 

- Ensure confidentiality and proper handling of owner, tenant, and vendor information. 

- Support audits, due diligence requests, and internal reporting as needed. 

- Perform other related duties as assigned. 



Qualifications and Experience: 

- Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Business Administration, Legal Studies, or a related field (or equivalent experience). 

- 2-3+ years of experience in contracts administration, proposals management, or a related role within property management, real estate, or construction. 

- End-to-end contract lifecycle management within property management

- Experience supporting residential, commercial, or mixed-use properties is a strong advantage.

This editor role is critical to our growth. You will help maintain our visual standards, execute repeatable workflows, and ensure every project meets our quality expectations while delivering a 10/10 client experience.

title: Amazon Product Research & Sourcing Virtual Assistant
description:
Amazon Product Research VA (Philippines ‚Äì Work From Home)



*Location: Remote (Philippines only)

*Schedule: Full-time, 9:00 AM ‚Äì 6:00 PM US time (night shift PH time)

*Position Type:  Long-term, full-time





About the Role



We are a US-based Amazon business looking for a reliable, detail-oriented "Product Research / Inventory Expansion VA" based in the Philippines.



Your main job will be to 'review products from our existing suppliers', compare them to Amazon listings, and add profitable items to our internal spreadsheet so we can list them for sale. The goal is simple: add as many profitable, correctly-analyzed SKUs as possible.



Key Responsibilities



* Review products on websites from suppliers where we already have open accounts

* Search for and match those products on Amazon (US and possibly other marketplaces)

* Check pricing, fees, competition, and sales rank to identify **profitable, viable products**

* Calculate basic profitability (e.g., cost, Amazon fees, profit, ROI, margin)

* Enter all approved products into Google Sheets/Excel with complete and accurate data

* Follow our SOPs for:



  * Product matching

  * Minimum ROI/profit requirements

  * Excluding restricted / problematic items

* Communicate progress and questions clearly via chat/email and regular check-ins

* Assist with updating and cleaning existing product/price sheets as needed



---



Requirements



* Must be based in the Philippines

* Fluent/proficient in written and spoken English

* Previous experience as an Amazon VA / Product Researcher / Online Arbitrage or Wholesale VA

* Strong experience using:



  * Amazon marketplace for product research

  * Google Sheets or Excel

  * (Bonus) Tools like Keepa, SellerAmp, Helium 10, etc.

* Ability to **accurately match products** between supplier websites and Amazon (no guessing)

* Comfortable working 'night shift' to match US business hours

* Fast and stable internet connection and a reliable computer

* High attention to detail, organized, and able to follow instructions/SOPs

* Honest, reliable, and looking for a long-term position





Nice to Have (Not Required)



* Experience with Amazon wholesale specifically

* Familiarity with FBA fees, Buy Box, and basic Amazon policies

* Experience creating product lists for other Amazon sellers





 Work Schedule & Compensation



* Full-time: 40 hours per week

* Work hours: 9:00 AM ‚Äì 6:00 PM US Eastern time (night shift in PH)

* Competitive salary in PHP (to be discussed during the interview, based on experience)

* Long-term, stable work for the right candidate



---



How to Apply



Please send the following:



1. Your CV/Resume

2. A short introduction about your Amazon product research experience

3. A brief description of the tools you‚Äôve used (e.g., Keepa, Helium 10, SellerAmp, etc.)

4. Your expected monthly salary in PHP

5. Your internet speed test result (screenshot or link)

6. Include the word banana in the
 subject so we know you read the full add. 



 subject line:

`Amazon Product Research VA ‚Äì [Your Name]`



(Optional but a big plus): Include a short Loom/video (1‚Äì3 minutes) introducing yourself and explaining your past Amazon VA experience.







We are looking for someone who wants to grow with us long-term. If you‚Äôre detail-oriented, comfortable with numbers, and experienced with Amazon product research, we‚Äôd love to hear from you.

title: Versatile Executive Virtual Assistant (Technical & Operations)
description:
I am seeking a high-caliber, tech-savvy Virtual Assistant to act as my "right hand" across both professional projects and personal operations. This is not a data-entry role; it is a position for a problem solver who can manage a spreadsheet in the morning, troubleshoot an automation workflow in the afternoon, and handle sensitive communications in between.

Key Responsibilities

‚Ä¢ Technical Operations: Building and maintaining automations using N8N, Make, or Zapier. Managing and moderate 
 communities.

‚Ä¢ Digital Development: Basic web/app development support and maintaining digital assets.

‚Ä¢ AI Integration: Utilizing and prompting AI platforms (ChatGPT, Claude, Midjourney, etc.) to optimize workflows.

‚Ä¢ Administrative & Communication: Managing professional and personal
s, drafting correspondence, and acting as a liaison.

‚Ä¢ Financial & Personal Admin: Basic accounting/bookkeeping, research tasks, and managing personal logistics.

‚Ä¢ Rapid Learning: Quickly mastering new software or platforms as they emerge.

Must-Have Qualifications

‚Ä¢ Work Hours: Need to work during U.S. -Moutain Standard time. 

‚Ä¢ Fluent English: Exceptional written and verbal communication skills are non-negotiable.

‚Ä¢ Technical Literacy: Proven experience with automation tools (Make/Zapier) and a strong grasp of the "logic" behind web tools.

‚Ä¢ Organizational Mastery: Ability to manage spreadsheets (Excel/Sheets) with advanced formulas or data organization.

‚Ä¢ The "Figure It Out" Factor: A proactive mindset where "I don't know" is always followed by "but I will find out."

title: DevOps
description:
Role summary

Own the reliability, security, and release process for our websites/web apps hosted on Synergy Wholesale. You‚Äôll set up and maintain DNS, SSL, environments, deployments, backups, and monitoring so the dev team can ship safely.



Time commitment

Part-time (typically 5‚Äì20 hrs/month to start), more during launches/migrations.



Key responsibilities



Synergy Wholesale hosting administration



Manage hosting accounts, cPanel settings, file permissions, PHP/runtime versions (as applicable)



Coordinate hosting changes and support tickets with Synergy when needed



Domains & DNS



Configure and troubleshoot DNS records (A/AAAA/CNAME/TXT/MX), redirects, and
/DNS conflicts



Manage domain renewals and DNS change control (document what changed and why)



SSL / HTTPS



Provision, install, and renew SSL certificates



Enforce HTTPS, configure redirects, and resolve mixed-content or certificate chain issues



Deployments & release process



Define a repeatable deployment workflow (Git ? build ? release) appropriate for cPanel hosting



Set up basic CI checks (lint/tests) and a safe promotion process (staging ? production)



Create rollback procedures and release checklists



Environments



Establish staging vs production (or equivalents) and manage configuration differences



Maintain secrets/configs securely (no secrets in repos; controlled access)



Backups & recovery



Ensure automated backups exist (site files + database) with retention



Run periodic restore tests and document recovery steps



Monitoring & i
 response



Set up uptime monitoring and alerting



Configure application error tracking (e.g., Sentry) and log access basics



Respond to i
: triage, mitigate, post-i
 notes



Security hygiene



Access control (MFA, least privilege), credential rotation, and basic hardening



Keep dependencies/patching practices on track with the dev team



Required experience / skills



Proven experience running production websites/apps on cPanel-style hosting (or similar managed hosting)



Strong DNS troubleshooting skills (including
-related records)



Hands-on SSL/TLS setup and debugging



Comfortable designing simple, reliable deployment workflows



Good documentation habits and change management mindset



Nice to have



Experience with Synergy Wholesale specifically (domains, DNS, hosting, reseller tooling)



GitHub Actions (or similar) for basic CI checks



Familiarity with WordPress/PHP deployments and/or Node/React static builds deployed to managed hosting



Security awareness (OWASP basics, secrets management)



Tools you‚Äôll use



Synergy Wholesale portal, cPanel/WHM (as applicable), GitHub/Git, CI checks, uptime monitoring, Sentry/logging tools, password manager (1Password/Bitwarden).



Success looks like



Deployments are repeatable and low-risk (with a rollback plan)



DNS/SSL issues are rare and resolved quickly



Backups are verified and restores are documented



Monitoring catches problems before clients do

title: Video Editor/Reviewer for History Documentary Content (Browse-Based tool)
description:
Job details



‚Ä¢ Average time investment per video project: less than 40 minutes per video, often less if there is nothing to fix)

‚Ä¢ Turnaround time: 24 hours per video (do not apply if you can‚Äôt match that)

‚Ä¢ $3 per reviewed video 

‚Ä¢ Videos range from 10- 12 min



The online platform we use (similar in complexity to CapCut) AUTOMATICALLY assembles the entire video based on the script we provide, including footage, narration, text overlays, and transitions.



Your role is to review the auto-generated output, catch any errors, add relevant images to enhance it and polish the final video according to our provided instructions. This typically takes LESS THAN 45 minutes per video.



Some videos require barely any changes, others might take a bit more, but in average it takes about 45 min tops per video.



Think of yourself as a quality control specialist and publisher rather than a traditional video editor.



?



Our Philosophy:

‚Ä¢ Attention to detail is everything. The platform does 90% of the work, we need someone with a razor-sharp eye to catch the remaining 10% of issues, improve them to ensure perfection.

‚Ä¢ We provide full, step-by-step instructions. Our content follows a proven formula with specific quality standards.

‚Ä¢ If you can follow instructions precisely and review every detail thoroughly, this will be a long-term partnership. If you rush through reviews, skip steps, or miss errors, this role is not for you, and we will not continue working together.

‚Ä¢ We are looking for someone who can understand basic instructions, know how to use video editing tools and can search relevant images about certain topics (not the first Google Image, but RELEVANT ones)



?



Requirements:

‚Ä¢ Experience with cloud-based video platforms (CapCut Web, Veed, Kapwing, Canva, or similar)

‚Ä¢ Exceptional attention to detail, ability to spot small errors that others overlook

‚Ä¢ Willingness to follow step-by-step instructions exactly as provided

‚Ä¢ Understanding of documentary-style content and educational pacing

‚Ä¢ Stable and fast internet connection for browser-based work

‚Ä¢ Reliability and consistency for daily/near-daily work

title: SEO Agency Partner | Expert Level

	‚Ä¢	This structure is designed to reward performance directly ‚Äî as the agency grows, your earnings grow alongside it.

title: SSR Specialist (Offshore)
description:
Reports to

Installation Manager



About This Role

The SSR Specialist plays a crucial role in the successful execution of solar installation projects by ensuring that safety protocols are adhered to and that the work site is adequately prepared for operations. This position requires a strong commitment to safety, organizational skills, and the ability to work collaboratively with installation teams to promote a culture of safety and efficiency throughout the project lifecycle.



Overall Responsibilities

?	Oversee the transportation and staging of materials on-site and on rooftops, ensuring compliance with safe handling procedures to minimize risks.

?	Assist with the installation of mounting systems, rails, and solar modules while adhering to established safety protocols and best practices.

?	Conduct regular site inspections to ensure adherence to safety procedures, including the appropriate use of Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) by all tea
mbers.

?	Provide training and guidance to new tea
mbers on industry standards, tools, and installation techniques, fostering a culture of safety and efficiency.

?	Perform site cleanup, tool organization, and equipment checks to maintain a clean and organized work environment, contributing to overall team productivity.

?	Collaborate with the Roof Lead and Foreman to monitor installation progress, address safety concerns promptly, and enhance operational efficiency.

?	Support the implementation of safety initiatives and training programs, while actively participating in safety meetings and reporting i
 or near misses as necessary.

?	Assist with documentation related to safety procedures, site readiness, and compliance with local regulations and industry standards.





Qualifications 

?	High school diploma or equivalent; relevant experience in construction, roofing, or solar installation is preferred.

?	Strong understanding of safety regulations and protocols related to rooftop work and solar installations.

?	Excellent organizational skills and ability to manage multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment.

?	Strong verbal and written communication skills, enabling effective collaboration with tea
mbers and supervisors.

?	Physical stamina and ability to work at heights, while performing physical tasks involved in solar installations.

?	Willingness to learn and adapt to industry standards and emerging technologies in the solar field.

title: QA Test Engineer ‚Äì Automation & Development

_Collaborating closely with developers, product owners, and other stakeholders to ensure high-quality deliverables.

_Continuously improving testing processes, tools, and best practices.

_4+ years of professional experience in QA, with hands-on experience in both manual and automation testing.

_Strong experience writing automated tests and scripts using Javascript.

_Solid understanding of the software development lifecycle (SDLC) and QA methodologies.

_Experience testing web applications.

How to Apply

description:

WordPress Multisite ‚Ä¢ Indexation ‚Ä¢ Schema ‚Ä¢ AI Overview Optimization

Remote

Time Tracker

title: Shopify Site Manager (Optimization & Email)

Shopify Site Health, Optimization & QA (Primary)

You are the owner of site integrity and functionality.

 ‚Äúsold out‚Äù states, or broken variants

Shopify Implementation & Ongoing Maintenance

Implement and maintain site updates after creative direction is provided

Work confidently within Shopify themes, templates, and backend settings

Upload and manage product images, files, and assets

Apply approved design patterns consistently across product, collection, and content pages

Ensure new changes do not disrupt live site performance

Own post-launch maintenance once design work is complete



Product, SKU & Catalog Management

Standardize and maintain SKUs, variants, pricing, inventory, and metadata

Ensure product listings are accurate, consistent, and conversion-ready

Maintain clean collection structures and product organization

Support periodic product additions or updates without breaking existing setups

Validate catalog accuracy as products and inventory change



 & Lifecycle Revenue (Core Revenue Responsibility)

 is a key revenue lever in this role.

Set up and manage Shopify
 for lifecycle and repeat-purchase flows

Implement post-purchase, replenishment, and re-engagement
 sequences

Support on-site
 capture via popups and forms

Coordinate
 timing around seasonal demand and promotions

Maintain clean segmentation and list health as the database grows

Support future migration to a more advanced platform (e.g. Klaviyo) if and when needed



Apps, Integrations & Wholesale Support

, CRO tools, wholesale)

description:

About ProMediaCO

ProMediaCO is the largest real estate media company in Utah, producing media for over 1,000+ agents annually and delivering thousands of real estate video projects every year.

We work with many of the top-performing real estate agents and brokerages in the state, producing high-end listing videos that generate millions of views across MLS platforms and social media.

Consistent, predictable daily work

Long-term stability

Professional workflows and clear systems

Competitive pay

Our top editors currently earn just under $4,000 per month, with opportunities to grow beyond that based on performance and capacity.



This is not a freelance gig. This is a long-term, stable editing position within a fast-growing, professional media company.

Why Top Editors Choose ProMediaCO



Unlike most editing roles, we offer:

Consistent daily workload

You will never need to search for work or clients.

Reliable, predictable income

Stable volume allows our editors to earn dependable monthly income.

Professional systems and organization

Long-term opportunity

Performance-based growth opportunities

Editors who perform well receive priority assignment and increased volume.



Role Overview

You will be responsible for editing cinematic real estate listing videos from raw footage into polished, professional final products.

This role requires speed, consistency, and strong attention to detail.

You will receive footage at approximately 9:00 PM Mountain Time (MST) and deliver completed edits by 9:00 AM MST the following morning.

Performance Expectations

title: Level 2 Help Desk Technician
description:
Summary  

A Level 2 Help Desk Technician will handle everything from routine troubleshooting to complex escalations. In addition, you‚Äôll act as a Project Engineer, providing technical support, working on assigned IT projects end-to-end, and driving the successful onboarding of both client and internal systems.  

 

Key Responsibilities  



Help Desk & Customer Support  

- Respond to customer inquiries via phone,
, or chat.

- Guide customers step-by-step to resolve technical problems using remote-desktop tools and help-desk software.  

- Document and track all interactions and resolutions in the ticketing system and knowledge base.  

- Escalate unresolved or high-priority i
 to Level 3 support and follow up to ensure a timely resolution.  

- Maintain professional, courteous communication to uphold high customer satisfaction.  



Technical & Project Engineering  

- Provide technical support to guide customers remotely, including installation, configuration, and maintenance of computer systems, networks, and peripherals.  

- Perform scheduled maintenance and software updates to ensure systems run optimally. 

- Participate in small- to mid-scale IT projects‚Äîfrom involved in the planning through execution and close-out‚Äîensuring scope, budget, and timelines are met. 

- Collaborate with the remote support team to transition complex i
 into formal service requests or project tasks.  

- Use project management tools to track deliverables, report status, and communicate with stakeholders. 

- Oversee the onboarding of new internal systems‚Äîdeveloping processes, conducting user training, and ensuring seamless integration.  

- Educate client IT staff on best practices for IT security, maintenance, and system administration.  



Qualifications  

- High school diploma or equivalent; some college coursework or technical certifications preferred (e.g., CompTIA A+, Network+, Microsoft Certified Professional). 

- 2+ years of experience in a helpdesk or in an MSP environment.  

- Hands-on experience as a technician or project engineer supporting Windows Server, Microsoft 365, and common IT systems.  

- Solid understanding of computer hardware, mobile devices, networking fundamentals, and basic cybersecurity principles.  

- Familiarity with remote-desktop applications, helpdesk/ticketing software, and project management platforms.  

- Strong document-creation skills, with emphasis on developing clear, step-by-step SOPs and How-To Guides for both internal teams and end-users.  

- Excellent troubleshooting, problem-solving, and documentation skills. 

- Excellent English verbal and written communication; able to translate technical concepts for non-technical audiences. Meaning you can speak Human and Tech and make it understandable to others who are not tech-savvy.  

- Ability to work both independently and collaboratively within a distributed remote team.  



Preferred Skills  

- AI-Enabled and for working with large language Models for troubleshooting and engineering.  

- Experience scripting for deployment of tools and updates in RMM (e.g., Datto RMM, EDR) and MDM (e.g., Microsoft Intune) environments.  

- Experience supporting macOS and Linux endpoints.  

- Hands-on knowledge of Azure AD, Okta, and other identity-management platforms.  

- Exposure to server virtualization (Hyper-V, VMware) and basic cloud infrastructure. 

- Understanding of Google Workspace administration. 

- Prior experience managing end-to-end IT projects, including stakeholder coordination and change management.  

- Certification or coursework in cybersecurity fundamentals (e.g., Security+, CISSP Associate).  



Why You‚Äôll Love Working with Us  

You‚Äôll join a dynamic team where your technical expertise and project-engineering skills will directly impact customer satisfaction and successful IT outcomes. We offer continual learning opportunities, certification support, and a collaborative environment that values innovation and professional growth.



Notes: When reaching out, please include your CV and your DISC assessment, thanks!

title: Full-Time Short Form Editor (TikTok / Reels)
description:
Hello there,



My name is Chris Seiter. I am the founder of a fairly large YouTube channel in the dating/relationship space (104k+ subscribers), and I also produce a high volume of short-form content across TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts. I prefer to work closely with my editors and build long-term creative partnerships.



The reason I‚Äôm here today is that I‚Äôm looking for a full-time short-form editor to come aboard and help scale our content output.



Job Description:



You will primarily be editing short-form videos (30 seconds to 3 minutes).



The goal is not ‚Äúbasic caption cutting.‚Äù We aim for highly engaging, scroll-stopping edits.



Videos must be optimized for retention: fast pacing, dynamic captions, pattern interrupts, zooms, b-roll, sound design, and occasional motion graphics.



Strong emphasis on hook optimization in the first 1‚Äì3 seconds.



You will be provided with:



A script (or structured outline)



Reference videos



Brand guidelines



Music and sound direction



We aim to produce 3‚Äì7 short-form videos per week, depending on performance.



Turnaround time is fast. You‚Äôll typically work on multiple videos per week rather than one long project.



This is not just ‚Äúcutting clips.‚Äù

We are engineering content designed to perform algorithmically.



Editing Standard:



Tight pacing (no dead air)



Captions that enhance emotion (not just transcriptions)



Strategic zoom-ins and punch-ins



Subtle but effective sound design



Pattern interrupts every 3‚Äì7 seconds



Clean, modern visual style



Ability to visually emphasize psychological concepts (diagrams, minimal motion graphics when needed)



Experience editing in the relationship/self-help niche is a plus.



Qualifications:



Proficient in Adobe Premiere Pro



Strong working knowledge of After Effects (basic to intermediate motion graphics)



Strong understanding of TikTok/Reels editing trends



Ability to think in terms of retention and watch time



Must provide a portfolio showcasing short-form work



Bonus points if you:



Understand storytelling structure



Know how to build tension in short form



Can suggest improvements to hooks

title: Full-Time Graphic Designer (40 hrs/week)
description:
ABOUT US:

We are a well-established e-commerce company with over 10 years of success in the baby products niche, specializing in party supplies. Our brand is powered by a growing team of high-achievers who value ownership, honesty, and continuous improvement. Many of our tea
mbers have been with us for years and grown into bigger roles. For instance, our manager started as a Virtual Assistant through OnlineJobs.ph nearly 5 years ago and has grown into her leadership role. We are committed to helping you succeed and invest in people who want to grow long-term, not just find ‚Äúanother online job.‚Äù



ABOUT THE ROLE:

We are looking for a reliable, detail-oriented, and creative full-time Graphic Designer who takes pride in high-quality work. You will work on product images, simple videos, AI-generated visuals, social media creatives, packaging, and light product design. You don‚Äôt need to know every tool yet, what matters most is that you are visually creative, eager to learn, and excited to improve every week. You are comfortable working with autonomy, responding to feedback, and you see this role as a chance to grow your skills and build a long-term career with PRIMEPURE.



This role offers semi-flexible hours with weekly calls across time zones and day-to-day work done independently.



CORE RESPONSIBILITIES:

- Edit and enhance product images for our listings and website (cleanups, simple retouching, basic composites).

- Create lifestyle images and simple mockups to showcase our products.

- Design social media creatives aligned with our brand.

- Assist with product packaging layouts and small product design elements.

- Create simple marketing assets such as banners,
 graphics, and promotional visuals.

- Use AI tools as part of your creative process (for example, to generate ideas, mockups, or variations) and refine outputs for real-world use.

- Organize design files and follow our brand guidelines and templates.

- Communicate clearly with the team in writing and on calls, sharing progress and asking smart questions when truly needed.



REQUIREMENTS:

- Strong visual sense and creativity: You care about aesthetics, composition, and clear visual communication.

- Basic experience with at least one design tool (e.g., Canva, Photoshop, Illustrator, or similar).

- Willingness and excitement to learn Photoshop and Illustrator with our guidance.

- Highly organized: Strong attention to detail and ability to manage multiple design tasks.

- Self-motivated and autonomous: You set mini-deadlines, move work forward without reminders, and keep your commitments.

- Research-first mindset: You look for tutorials, inspiration, and examples before asking the team.

- Eager to learn: You actively look for feedback, new tools, and better ways to work.



DESIRED SKILLS (preferred but not required):

- Familiarity with e-commerce or product-based brands (Amazon, Shopify, etc.).

- Experience with short-form video editing (reels, TikToks, simple product videos).

- Experience creating packaging, labels, or print-ready files.

- Experience using tools like Asana, Slack, or similar project-management/communication platforms.



BENEFITS:

- 100% remote work.

- Competitive salary with opportunities for performance-based increases up to twice per year.

- Internet bill coverage.

- Long-term growth opportunities in a stable, fast-moving company.

- Access to training resources and a supportive leadership team that wants you to succeed.



NOTE ABOUT USE OF AI:

We actively use and encourage AI tools in our day-to-day work, and we see them as a powerful way to work smarter. However, during the hiring process we ask that you complete all application questions and exercises yourself, without AI assistance. We genuinely want to get to know the real YOU, not a "perfectly polished, robotic answer" you. Don‚Äôt worry about sentence structure or grammar; what matters to us is the substance of your answers and the honesty behind them. If we believe AI has been used to generate your responses, your application will not be considered.



HOW TO APPLY (READ CAREFULLY):

- Use this
 subject line exactly: "I will not use AI"

- At the very top of your
 body, before anything else, write this sentence exactly: "Hello PRIMEPURE team, I pay attention to small details"

- In the rest of the
 body, in a few short sentences, answer these two questions:



1. What would you want us to remember about you after reading 100 applications? Feel free to attach your portfolio here.

2. What are your salary expectations for this position (per month in USD)?



Applications that do not follow these few simple instructions will sadly not be considered. If shortlisted, you‚Äôll receive an
 from Anna with instructions on the next steps. Thank you for your time, and best of luck!
