title: Business Development Representative (LinkedIn Specialist)
description:
Ironborn Ventures is seeking a hungry, experienced Business Development Representative specializing in LinkedIn outreach.



This is not an entry-level position. We are not looking for someone who needs to be taught how to prospect. We need someone who has done this before, has the results to prove it, and can hit the ground running. You will be responsible for generating qualified leads and booking appointments through LinkedIn (in addition to any other service you've had success with) for our AI-powered sales acquisition business. We work with coaches, consultants, and service businesses etc. You will go through a direct onboarding process with company leadership to understand our brands, our offers, and our approach. After that, you run.



This is a base salary plus commission role. The harder you work, the more you make. Period.



COMPENSATION BREAKDOWN



Base salary: $600/month USD (Can be bumped up to $800 base, after 90 days, depending on results)



Commission: 10% of every sale generated from qualified appointments you set. Our lowest package nets $1,750. That means your minimum commission per closed deal is $175. Our packages scale up from there, as high as $30,000, which means your commission on a closed deal at that rate would be $3000, on one deal. The more you close, the more you earn.



There is no cap.



This is a real money-making opportunity for someone who is motivated, disciplined, and wants to control their own income.



WHAT WE NEED FROM YOU



Verifiable experience in LinkedIn lead generation and outreach. Show us what you have done, not what you think you can do.

Your own action plan. Come to the table with a strategy. We want to see how you think and how you operate.

Strong written English. You will be reaching out to business owners in the United States. Your communication needs to be sharp.



Self-starter mentality. You will have support, but you will not be micromanaged. If you need someone standing over your shoulder to get work done, this is not the role for you. Hunger. We have built something big, and we want you to go bigger with us. We want someone who wants to build with us and get paid well doing it.



WHAT YOU GET



Direct onboarding with company leadership so you fully understand the business, the offers, and the positioning across multiple brands



A proven offer that converts. You are not selling something nobody wants. Our system books meetings and delivers results.

Uncapped commission structure. Your effort directly determines your paycheck.

Fantastic opportunity with a growing company. Prove yourself and grow with us.



ABOUT IRONBORN VENTURES

Ironborn Ventures provides done-for-you AI-powered sales acquisition systems for coaches, consultants, and service businesses. We handle everything from the first contact to the booked meeting. No setup fees. No monthly retainers. Our clients pay for usage, and we provide the system. We are a small, fast-moving team based in Chicago that values direct communication, ownership, and results.



HOW TO APPLY

Send a message introducing yourself. Tell us about your LinkedIn outreach experience, and other forms of outreach, share examples of results you have generated, and outline your approach. Keep it direct. We do not need a novel. We need to see that you know what you are doing and that you are ready to work.



P.S. To confirm you read this entire description and can follow simple instructions, include "green machine" in your application subject line. Applications without "green machine" in the subject line will be automatically rejected. This is not optional.

title: EXPERIENCED GENERAL VIRTUAL ASSISTANT
description:
About Dreambound Inc.



Dreambound Inc. is a platform dedicated to facilitating upward mobility in America. Our mission is to help prospective students find the right educational programs across Healthcare, Technology, Business, and Trade and Industry so they can achieve their career goals. We connect students with 300+ schools, offer personalized coaching, and provide the support needed to take charge of their future. We are a fast-paced, mission-driven team committed to making education accessible and impactful.





The Opportunity

We are seeking a highly organized, experienced, and versatile General Virtual Assistant (VA) to join our team.

This role is best suited for a seasoned professional who thrives in dynamic environments, can manage multiple priorities independently, and brings a strong track record of administrative and operational support. You should be a proactive self-starter with excellent organizational skills, high accuracy, and the ability to quickly learn and adapt to new tools and systems.





This is a full-time, long-term role (40 hours per week).

Please use the code DreamTeam when applying through the link below.





Key Responsibilities

- Responsibilities include, but are not limited to:

- Provide administrative and organizational support across multiple teams and stakeholders.

- Handle evolving assignments and projects with minimal supervision.

- Anticipate needs, take initiative, and contribute to process improvement and problem-solving.

- Conduct internet research and data collection to support strategic initiatives.

- Maintain accurate and organized records in internal databases and spreadsheets.

- Support tasks related to lead generation, demand generation, and basic SEO maintenance.





Requirements

- Proven experience as a Virtual Assistant, Executive Assistant, Operations Assistant, or similar role.

- Full-time availability (40 hours per week) with no other work commitments.

- Ability to work during Philippine day shift hours.

- Exceptional attention to detail and ability to work efficiently in a fast-paced environment.

- High level of autonomy, accountability, and problem-solving skills.

- Strong written and verbal communication skills in English.

- Comfortable working with spreadsheets, databases, and productivity tools.





Highly Valued



- Experience with Demand Generation or Marketing Operations workflows.

- Familiarity with SaaS tools, technical workflows, or basic troubleshooting.

- Experience using CRM platforms and automation tools

- Advanced spreadsheet skills (VLOOKUP, QUERY, INDEX/MATCH, automation workflows).

- SEO experience, including basic on-page optimization, keyword research, content updates, and maintaining SEO best practices across pages or databases.

- AI-forward mindset and experience, including working with AI tools to improve efficiency, research quality, documentation, automation, or operational workflows. Comfort experimenting with new AI tools and integrating them into day-to-day work is a strong plus.





Apply



We only accept applications via this link: 
/to/q4cC2iKY#referredby=xxxxx

title: Senior Cloud Infrastructure Engineer ‚Äì AWS Cost Reduction & K8s Optimization
description:
Job Description:

About the Role

We're a blockchain/DeFi company running production infrastructure that's bleeding money unnecessarily. Our AWS bill is sitting at $4,500/month ‚Äì and we know it shouldn't be anywhere near that. We need someone who can come in, audit the whole setup, and actually fix it. Not just give us a report that sits in a folder.



We've already been through a few candidates who talked a big game but couldn't execute. We're done with that. If you're the type who needs handholding or can't work independently, this isn't for you.





What You'll Actually Do

- Audit our entire AWS infrastructure and identify exactly where we're wasting money (we expect significant savings)

- Optimize our Kubernetes clusters ‚Äì right-size nodes, fix resource requests/limits, implement autoscaling that actually works

- Implement cost controls: Reserved Instances, Savings Plans, spot instances where appropriate, and cleanup of orphaned resources

- Set up monitoring and alerts so costs don't creep back up without us knowing

- Document everything you do so the team can maintain it





Hard Requirements (Non-Negotiable)

- 3+ years hands-on Kubernetes experience in production environments ‚Äì EKS specifically preferred

- Deep AWS knowledge: EC2, EKS, RDS, S3, CloudWatch, Cost Explorer, Trusted Advisor

- Proven track record of actually reducing AWS costs (be ready to share numbers/percentages)

- Strong scripting skills (Python, Bash) for automation

- Infrastructure as Code: Terraform or CloudFormation (Terraform preferred)

- Self-starter who can take ownership and execute without constant oversight





!!!!CRITICAL: This Role Requires Surgical Precision

This is production infrastructure running live systems. Think of this like surgery ‚Äì one wrong move can take everything down.

- NO cowboy moves. You don't delete, modify, or remove anything without a clear plan first.

- Every change must be planned out, documented, and confirmed with the CEO before execution.

- Extreme attention to detail. You double-check and triple-check before touching anything.

- If you're not 100% sure what something does, you ask first. You don't assume.

- Methodical execution only. We value careful and correct over fast and reckless.





Strong Plus

- Experience with blockchain/Web3 infrastructure

- Karpenter, Cluster Autoscaler, or KEDA experience

-  AWS certifications (Solutions Architect, DevOps Engineer)

- Experience with FinOps tools (Kubecost, CloudHealth, 
)





What We Need In Your Application

Don't send a generic application. We will ignore it. Include:

- Specific examples of AWS cost optimization you've done ‚Äì what was the setup, what did you change, what % did you save?

- Your Kubernetes experience ‚Äì cluster sizes you've managed, scaling strategies you've implemented

- Your availability and timezone (we need someone who can overlap with US business hours for some calls)





Compensation & Structure

- $20-25/hour based on experience and proven results

- 20 hours/week to start ‚Äì potential for more hours for the right person

- Fully remote

- Initial project: Comprehensive audit + implementation plan with clear cost reduction targets





If you're someone who can actually deliver results and not just talk about them ‚Äì we want to hear from you. Show us what you've done.

title: True Crime Research Compiler (Timeline + Source + Visual Asset Research)
description:
Position Type:

Part-Time | Remote | Ongoing Work

About The Role

We produce high-level, documentary-style true crime content for YouTube.

You will NOT be writing scripts.

You will be responsible for building the research backbone of each story before scripting begins.

You will receive:

‚Ä¢ The case name

‚Ä¢ A short outline of the story direction

‚Ä¢ A Google Doc Template: 

‚Ä¢ Your job is to fully build that document out.



Your Responsibilities

For each case, you will:

‚Ä¢ Compile a clean, chronological timeline of events

‚Ä¢ Pull all credible source links (news articles, court documents, transcripts)

‚Ä¢ Summarize key beats in concise bullet form

‚Ä¢ Locate relevant photos, archival footage, and B-roll sources

‚Ä¢ Link to documentaries or interviews that contain useful footage

You are building the research package that makes production fast and accurate.



What We‚Äôre Looking For

‚Ä¢ Strong English reading comprehension

‚Ä¢ Extremely detail oriented

‚Ä¢ Able to cross-check multiple sources

‚Ä¢ Familiar with Google Docs

‚Ä¢ Able to organize information clearly

‚Ä¢ Interest in documentary or investigative storytelling

Bonus:

‚Ä¢ Experience researching true crime cases

‚Ä¢ Familiarity with court records or FOIA-style research

‚Ä¢ Ability to identify strong visual material for YouTube

Important

This is NOT simple Googling.

We need:

‚Ä¢ Accurate timelines

‚Ä¢ Primary sources when possible

‚Ä¢ Clear citations

‚Ä¢ Organized formatting

You will be tested with one paid sample case before long-term work is offered.

- ‚ÄúSend me more information.‚Äù ? into ‚ÄúWhat are the next steps?‚Äù

- ‚ÄúI‚Äôm upset.‚Äù ? into ‚ÄúI appreciate how you handled that.‚Äù

You communicate clearly, confidently, and professionally on the phone.

REQUIRED SKILLS & TOOLS

If you are not actively using AI in your workflow, this role is not for you.





COMPENSATION

- Performance bonuses

- Revenue-based upside

- Long-term growth opportunity



Top performers will make significantly more than base pay.



$2,000 USD per month in base pay and commission is minimum expectation after 90 day probationary onboarding period.



This is performance-driven.





SCHEDULE



Long-term expectation:

- 7:00 AM ‚Äì 4:00 PM EST

- Break: 11:00 AM ‚Äì 12:00 PM



Initial schedule may start as:

- 8:00 AM ‚Äì 3:00 PM

- 9:00 AM ‚Äì 3:00 PM



All schedules include:

Consistency is non-negotiable.





GROWTH PATH 



If you are elite:



You may:

- Set high-level appointments

- Move into revenue leadership

- Help expand into new markets



High upside for serious operators.





APPLICATION PROCESS (STRICT)



If you do not follow instructions exactly, your application will not be reviewed.



Text WhatsApp +1 (704)
Step 1 -Send The Following

‚ÄúHi, is this Jackie? This is [your name], I'm a local real estate agent. I'm sure you know that your house came off the market today, and I'm calling because I am confident that I can... SELL YOUR HOUSE... and I'd like to meet with you for just 20 minutes and show you exactly what I do differently to get houses sold in today's market. Would 1 o'clock work for you today or would 2 be better? 



Recording must be:

THIS ROLE IS NOT FOR YOU IF

FINAL NOTE

We need professionals who can:

title: Short Form Video Editor (YouTube Shorts, Meta Reels, TikTok)

You must be available during US business hours (EST).

This is not just a clipping job. This is storytelling.



-----



What You‚Äôll Be Editing:



 ‚Ä¢ YouTube Shorts

 ‚Ä¢ Quick tips, rankings, reactions, and 
nts

Content themes include:

 ‚Ä¢ Cruise ship reviews

 ‚Ä¢ Money-saving tips

 ‚Ä¢ Honest opinions and hot takes



-----



What I'm Looking For:



You:

 ‚Ä¢ Understand pacing for vertical content

Bonus if you:

-----



Editing Expectations:

 ‚Ä¢ Clean jump cuts

 ‚Ä¢ Light motion graphics when appropriate

 ‚Ä¢ Sound design that enhances but doesn‚Äôt distract



I'm not looking for:

 ‚Ä¢ Overly flashy transitions

 ‚Ä¢ 
 overload

 ‚Ä¢ Random stock B-roll



-----



Success Looks Like:



 ‚Ä¢ High retention in first 5 seconds

 ‚Ä¢ Clear, tight storytelling (without needing exactly direction)

 ‚Ä¢ Clean pacing

 ‚Ä¢ Scroll-stopping hooks

 ‚Ä¢ Content that drives viewers to long-form videos

In the last 3 months, we just grew from 5 ? 10 people across Engineering, Design, and are now bringing on an SDR to scale our outbound motion.



The Role

, and in-person (SF events + occasional travel)

title: Senior English SEO Content Writer & Editor Virtual Assistant
description:
MarketCrest is a fast-growing lead generation and digital marketing agency that serves immigration law firms and contracting businesses. We are hiring a full-time virtual assistant with outstanding English editing skills who can write, optimize, and assemble client-ready content across blogs, city pages, service pages, press releases, media placements and MailChimp newsletters. Editing is the core skill. The right person will own quality, help scale our content production, and learn the nuances of 30+ client brands and service offerings.



ROLE SUMMARY

This is primarily an editing role with writing, SEO and
 production responsibilities. You will: edit and proofread long-form and short-form web copy, write when required, assemble MailChimp campaigns, and design simple
 banners in Canva. Editing is the highest priority. You must have near-native English skills and proven editorial judgement.



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

‚Ä¢ Edit and proofread all client content to a near-publish state. This includes rewriting for clarity, tone, structure, accuracy, and SEO while removing AI-like phrasing.

‚Ä¢ Write high-quality drafts for blogs, service pages, city pages, press releases and media placements when required.

‚Ä¢ Build MailChimp campaigns: write subject lines and copy, design banners and assemble the campaign in MailChimp.

‚Ä¢ Design lightweight
 banners and simple graphics in Canva that match client branding.

‚Ä¢ Optimize content for SEO: implement target keywords, metadata, internal linking and local modifiers for city pages.

‚Ä¢ Ensure legal content follows marketing compliance rules for attorneys.

‚Ä¢ Follow MarketCrest SOPs for writing, press releases, PR submission and Google Business Profile tasks and upload deliverables to shared drives for review. 



REQUIRED SKILLS AND COMPETENCY

‚Ä¢ Editing and English grammar: (5/5). Able to transform first drafts into publication-ready copy with correct punctuation, flow, and tone.

‚Ä¢ Writing:  (5/5). Clear, concise, client-focused writing for service pages, blogs, press releases and newsletters.

‚Ä¢ SEO fundamentals: (4/5). Keyword placement, meta descriptions, on-page best practices and internal linking.

‚Ä¢ MailChimp and
 assembly: (3/5). Can build campaigns, edit templates and implement A/B testing.

‚Ä¢ Graphic design (Canva) for
 banners and simple social images: (3/5). Good sense of layout, branding, and readable typography.

‚Ä¢ Legal and technical topic comprehension: strong ability to research and accurately write about legal topics and contractor services while respecting regulatory constraints.

‚Ä¢ Organization and client management: comfortable owning client cheat sheets and managing simultaneous work across 30+ brands.

‚Ä¢ If you have any knowledge or experience writing or editing in Spanish, that is a HUGE bonus for us.



TOOLS WE USE

Jasper AI, MailChimp, WordPress, Local Viking (Google Business), Canva, Grammarly, Copyscape, Teams, Sharepoint. We have detailed documentation about our processes and requirements. The ability to read, understand and implement these processes is crucial.



EXPERIENCE AND QUALIFICATIONS

‚Ä¢ College degree in English, Journalism, Communications, Marketing, Law-Related discipline or equivalent demonstrated experience.

‚Ä¢ Minimum 3 years writing and editing experience (digital agencies, law firms or professional services preferred)

‚Ä¢ Demonstrated ability to learn client-specific rules and apply them consistently across content.



WORKING HOURS, PAY & LOGISTICS

‚Ä¢ Full-time role. Must be have a reliable laptop, home office, and stable internet.

‚Ä¢ Availability for overlapping hours with Australian business time is required. 

‚Ä¢ Suggested pay: competitive and commensurate with experience. State your salary expectations.



APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS

Please provide a resume and 1-2 paragraphs about why you're a good fit for the role and your salary expectations. Applicants who move forward will be given an SEO editing/writing competency test.

title: Sales Support Specialist
description:
US E-Commerce Company ‚Äî Garage Storage, Attic Lifts & Access Equipment



Schedule: Full-Time, Monday‚ÄìFriday, 9:00 AM ‚Äì 6:00 PM or 10:00 AM ‚Äì 7:00 PM US Eastern Time (40 hours/week)

Compensation: $12‚Äì$14 USD/hour (based on experience), paid weekly or biweekly

Start Date: Immediate / As soon as the right person is found

Location: Remote ‚Äî Philippines



---------- ABOUT US ----------



We are a fast-growing US-based e-commerce company specializing in high-ticket residential and commercial products: garage storage systems, attic lifts, motorized stairs, and specialty access equipment. Our customers are a mix of homeowners undertaking renovation projects and construction professionals (contractors, architects, builders) specifying products for their clients.



We finished 2024 at over $2.3 million in revenue and are on pace for $3.6 million in 2026. This is a real, profitable, founder-led business ‚Äî not a startup burning cash. You would be working directly with the owner and joining a small, high-trust team.



We are looking for someone who can become a core part of our growth. This is not a task-based VA role. This is a professional sales support position where your construction knowledge, communication skills, and initiative will directly impact revenue.



---------- WHAT YOU'LL BE DOING ----------



Lead Response & Qualification (50%)

‚Ä¢ Answer inbound inquiries from homeowners and professionals via phone, live chat, and

‚Ä¢ Ask the right questions to understand their project: What are they building? What type of roof structure? What are the ceiling/floor dimensions? Do they need installation?

‚Ä¢ Guide customers through product selection based on their specific construction situation

‚Ä¢ Provide accurate product specifications, pricing, and shipping timelines

‚Ä¢ Qualify leads and identify which prospects are ready to buy vs. which need nurturing



Pipeline Management & Follow-Up (35%)

‚Ä¢ Own the CRM (HubSpot) ‚Äî update contact records, log all interactions, move leads through pipeline stages

‚Ä¢ Systematically follow up with leads who are in a research or decision phase

‚Ä¢ Maintain regular touchpoints with professional leads on longer sales cycles (weeks to months) ‚Äî check-ins, quote follow-ups, project timeline updates

‚Ä¢ Re-engage a backlog of 200+ recent leads who have not been contacted

‚Ä¢ Ensure no qualified lead falls through the cracks



Sales Support & Coordination (15%)

‚Ä¢ Prepare quotes and product recommendations for the owner to review on larger/complex deals

‚Ä¢ Flag hot leads and escalate to the owner when they are ready to close

‚Ä¢ Identify patterns in customer questions and suggest improvements to our sales process

‚Ä¢ Coordinate with our post-sale operations tea
mber on order handoffs



---------- WHO WE'RE LOOKING FOR ----------



REQUIRED:



‚Ä¢ Construction industry experience ‚Äî You must understand basic construction concepts: roof types (truss vs. rafter), framing, joists, ceiling heights, garage dimensions, attic access. This is not something we can easily teach remotely. If a homeowner says "I have a 2x6 rafter roof with a 10/12 pitch," you need to know what that means or learn it very quickly.



‚Ä¢ Excellent spoken English ‚Äî You will be on the phone regularly with American homeowners and contractors. Clear pronunciation, natural conversational flow, and the ability to build rapport over the phone are essential. We will conduct an unscripted video/voice interview as part of the hiring process.



‚Ä¢ Sales or customer-facing experience ‚Äî You've worked in a role where you talked to customers, answered questions, and helped them make purchasing decisions. Inside sales, customer service in a technical environment, or B2B sales support all count.



‚Ä¢ CRM experience ‚Äî You've used a CRM system to track leads and manage a pipeline. HubSpot experience is a strong plus but not required.



‚Ä¢ Reliable internet and a quiet workspace ‚Äî This is a phone-heavy role. Background noise, dropped calls, or laggy connections are not workable.



‚Ä¢ Available to work US Eastern Time business hours ‚Äî 9 AM to 6 PM or 10 AM to 7 PM ET, Monday through Friday.



STRONGLY PREFERRED:



‚Ä¢ Experience in building products, building materials, or home improvement industry

‚Ä¢ Experience selling or supporting sales of high-ticket items ($2,000‚Äì$5,000+)

‚Ä¢ Experience working with both retail customers (homeowners) and trade professionals (contractors, architects)

‚Ä¢ Familiarity with Shopify

‚Ä¢ Experience working remotely for a US-based company



WHO WILL THRIVE IN THIS ROLE:



‚Ä¢ You are patient and genuinely enjoy helping people work through decisions ‚Äî even when they ask the same question three different ways

‚Ä¢ You are organized and follow through ‚Äî if you tell a customer you'll call them Thursday, you call them Thursday

‚Ä¢ You take initiative ‚Äî if a lead goes quiet, you don't wait to be told to follow up

‚Ä¢ You are comfortable with complexity ‚Äî our products have many specifications and our customers' construction situations vary widely

‚Ä¢ You want a long-term position with room to grow ‚Äî we are building a team, not hiring for a project



---------- WHAT WE OFFER ----------



‚Ä¢ $12‚Äì$14 USD/hour depending on your experience ‚Äî this is a premium rate and reflects the level of skill we're looking for

‚Ä¢ Stable, long-term employment ‚Äî this is not a contract gig. We are looking for someone who will be with us for years

‚Ä¢ Growth opportunity ‚Äî As you develop product expertise, your role will expand from nurturing/qualifying to independently closing sales. There is a clear path from sales support to a full sales role with performance bonuses or commission

‚Ä¢ Direct access to the business owner ‚Äî You will work closely with the founder, not through layers of management. Your ideas and feedback are valued.

‚Ä¢ Small team, big impact ‚Äî You'll be the 4th full time tea
mber. What you do matters. You're not a number.



---------- HOW TO APPLY ----------



*** IMPORTANT ‚Äî This is a two-step application. You must complete BOTH steps. Applications missing either step will not be reviewed. ***



STEP 1: Submit your application here on OnlineJobs.ph



‚Ä¢ Use EXACTLY 4 Apply Points when submitting your application.

‚Ä¢ Use this EXACT subject line format: Sales Support ‚Äì [Your First Name] ‚Äì [Your Years of Construction Experience]

  Example: Sales Support ‚Äì Marco ‚Äì 6 Years

‚Ä¢ In your message, confirm that you have completed the application form (Step 2 below). You do not need to repeat your full answers here ‚Äî just confirm you submitted the form.



STEP 2: Complete our application form







This form includes questions about your construction experience, sales background, and CRM usage. It also requires two uploads:



1. A 2‚Äì3 minute VOICE RECORDING (unscripted ‚Äî just talk naturally about your background and why you're a fit for this role). This is required. Applications without a voice recording will not be reviewed.



2. A SCREENSHOT of your internet speed test from speedtest.net.



The form takes 15‚Äì20 minutes to complete. Please answer every question thoughtfully and in your own words.



WHAT HAPPENS NEXT:



We will cross-reference your OJP application with your form submission. Both must be complete and consistent. Applications that follow all instructions will be reviewed within 3‚Äì5 business days.





---------- HIRING PROCESS
. Application review (AI-assisted matching + manual review of both OJP application and form submission)

2. Video interview (unscripted conversation, not a formal Q&A)

3. Paid trial task: Respond to 3 sample customer scenarios we provide

4. Reference check

5. 30-day paid trial period



We are not looking for someone who is "willing to learn construction." We need someone who already has a foundation in this area and can build on it quickly.



Thank you for your time. We look forward to hearing from you.

title: Influencer Outreach Specialist ‚Äì Peptide & Biohacking Niche
description:
On the terminology question: "Peptides" is totally fine ‚Äî it's a legitimate scientific/health term and OnlineJobs.ph won't flag it. "Research chemicals" I'd avoid. It carries connotations that could get flagged or scare off applicants. Use "research-use compounds" or "research peptides" instead ‚Äî same meaning, zero risk.

Here's the updated job description:

We are a US-based e-commerce company specializing in research-use peptides and the biohacking/performance optimization space. We are looking for a sharp, self-driven Influencer Outreach Specialist who can identify, contact, and build relationships with niche content creators and influencers in the peptide, bodybuilding, anti-aging, and longevity communities.



IMPORTANT: We do not currently have a brand Instagram account. You will be responsible for creating and managing an outreach-focused Instagram presence that you will use to connect with influencers directly. This is a ground-floor opportunity to help build our influencer program from scratch.



We offer influencers very competitive rates and partnership opportunities, so you will NOT be cold-pitching with nothing to offer ‚Äî you'll have real budget and attractive deals to bring to the table.



YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES:

- Create and manage a professional Instagram account to use as a home base for influencer outreach

- Research and build targeted lists of micro and mid-tier influencers (5K‚Äì100K followers) across Instagram, YouTube,
/X, TikTok, and
 in the peptide, biohacking, bodybuilding, and longevity niches

- Aggressively research competitor peptide brands, identify which influencers and creators they are working with, and recruit those influencers to work with us instead ‚Äî offering better rates, better products, and better partnerships

- Send personalized DM and
 outreach to prospective influencers on behalf of the brand

- Negotiate and coordinate content deals (paid posts, affiliate arrangements, product-for-review, UGC)

- Track all outreach, responses, negotiations, and campaign performance in a shared spreadsheet or CRM

- Monitor competitor activity on an ongoing basis ‚Äî know who they're sponsoring, what deals they're offering, and where the gaps are

- Stay current on community trends, language, and culture within the peptide and biohacking space



IDEAL CANDIDATE:

- Has personal interest or knowledge in peptides, fitness, supplements, biohacking, or health optimization

- Understands influencer marketing mechanics (engagement rates, audience quality, negotiation tactics)

- Competitive mindset ‚Äî you enjoy the challenge of winning over creators from rival brands

- Excellent written English ‚Äî outreach messages need to sound natural, persuasive, and personalized

- Highly organized, self-motivated, and comfortable working independently with minimal supervision

- Familiar with tools like Google Sheets, Instagram, YouTube analytics, and basic CRM platforms

- Bonus: Experience with affiliate program management or influencer databases (Modash, Heepsy, or similar)



This is a long-term role with room to grow for the right person. We want someone who operates like it's their own brand ‚Äî resourceful, aggressive, and proud of the partnerships they build.



Please include in your application:

1. Any experience in influencer outreach, social media management, or competitor research

2. Your familiarity with the peptide, fitness, or biohacking space (even personal interest counts)

3. Name 2 peptide or supplement brands you're aware of and one influencer you'd target for us (shows you can research)

title: Senior US Tax Accountant
description:
PLEASE READ BEFORE APPLYING. This role is open only for candidates who has experience in US Taxation.



Job Description





Role Title: Senior US Tax Accountant

Shift: 07:00 AM - 03:30 PM PST

Salary: $1,700







Overview:



We are seeking a highly experienced Senior US Tax Accountant with strong hands-on expertise in U.S. federal and multi-state taxation, including extensive experience with Schedule E, pass-through entities, and real estate taxation. This role will be responsible for preparing and reviewing complex tax returns, handling advanced tax compliance and planning, and serving as a technical resource for clients and internal teams.







Key Responsibilities:



Prepare and review U.S. federal and state tax returns including:

Individuals (Form 1040)

Corporations (Forms 1120, 1120S)

Partnerships (Form 1065)

Trusts and Estates (Form 1041)

Prepare and review Schedule E for:





-Rental real estate income and expenses



-Depreciation and cost segregation



-Passive activity loss limitations



-K-1 income from partnerships and S-corporations



-Basis, at-risk, and passive loss carryforwards



-Handle multi-state filings and allocations for pass-through entities.



-Prepare tax provisions, estimates, extensions, and quarterly filings.



-Perform tax research and provide technical guidance on complex issues.



-Review fixed assets, depreciation schedules, and amortization.



-Support IRS and state audits, notices, and correspondence.



-Provide tax planning strategies to minimize liabilities.



-Communicate directly with clients regarding tax matters and compliance.







Qualifications:



Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Accounting or Finance (Master‚Äôs in Tax preferred).

CPA or EA strongly preferred.

5+ years of U.S. public accounting experience in taxation.

Strong expertise in Schedule E, rental real estate, partnerships, and S-corps.

Advanced knowledge of U.S. federal and state tax law.

Proficiency with tax software such as UltraTax, ProSystem fx, Lacerte, CCH Axcess, or similar.

Experience with multi-state and multi-entity structures.

Excellent written and verbal English communication skills.

Highly organized, detail-oriented, and able to manage multiple deadlines.

Preferred Experience:



U.S. CPA firm or large accounting firm background.

Real estate, investment, and high-net-worth individual tax clients.

Review and leadership experience managing junior staff.

Ability to work U.S. business hours and collaborate with U.S. teams.

title: Business Development & Client Success Coordinator
description:
About the Role

Sera Engineered is a growing civil engineering firm specializing in design and surveying. We are looking for a high-energy, proactive individual to manage our client relationships, ensure timely project updates, and drive revenue through professional collections and service expansion.



This is NOT a passive administrative role. You will be the "voice of the firm," actively calling clients to track construction progress, update them on their designs, and introduce them to our full suite of civil services.



Core Responsibilities (The 6 Pillars)

Strategic Collections: Manage accounts receivable by calling past-due accounts to secure payment dates and maintain steady cash flow.



Construction Status Tracking: Conduct "Design-to-Dirt" checks by calling past clients to see if they have broken ground or entered the construction phase.



Service Expansion (Upselling): Educate current clients on our full service list. If we are doing their Survey, you will pitch our Landscape Design, Utility Design, and Stormwater Management.



Weekly Client Updates: Proactively reach out to every active client once a week to provide progress reports so they never have to wonder about the status of their design.



Permit Tracking: Coordinate with city and county agencies to track the status of submitted plans and relay updates back to our engineering team and the client.



Lead Generation & Data Hygiene: Call past clients to check on project success and identify new opportunities while keeping our QuickBooks and CRM data 100?curate.



Requirements

Communication: Exceptional verbal and written English. You must be comfortable making 30‚Äì50 outbound calls per day.



Tech Savvy: Proficiency in QuickBooks Online (Time Tracking/Invoicing) and Microsoft Excel.



Experience: Previous experience in an engineering, architectural, or construction-related firm is a plus.



Professionalism: Ability to work a consistent 40-hour week. You must be comfortable using G-P (Globalization Partners) for payroll and compliance.



Mindset: You are a "hunter" who looks for work. If one task is finished, you move to the next without being told.

Strive Sports and Health is a growing allied health clinic with locations in Sydney. We help people move better, recover properly, and stay active ‚Äî not just get short-term pain relief.



We‚Äôre looking for a Patient Care & Booking Coordinator to manage incoming messages and enquiries and help patients take the next step in their care.

SMS and Podiu
ssages



 inbox

Pay

s

title: Virtual Property Manager
description:
Virtual Property Manager & Admin Virtual Assistant (Short-Term Rentals)

We‚Äôre a fast-growing startup based in Illinois managing a portfolio of short-term rentals ‚Äî and we‚Äôre looking for a proactive, detail-oriented, and guest-obsessed Virtual Assistant to join our small but mighty team.



If you love working in startup environments, collaborating with a close-knit group, and want a role with tons of growth potential, then we want you on board.



What You‚Äôll Be Doing

Guest Experience & Support

Handle guest messages and phone calls with empathy, urgency, and professionalism

Resolve escalated guest concerns, route urgent issues, and coordinate with cleaners or maintenance teams using Breezeway or Notion

Monitor and respond to guest reviews, including turning around negative feedback



Administrative Support

Create and update internal SOPs, FAQs, message templates, and house manuals

Maintain clean, up-to-date communication logs and file Airbnb claims when needed

Generate and track invoices, support payment communications, and log expenses



Property Management

Assist with onboarding new properties and entering accurate details into PMS tools like Hostaway or Guesty

Build and update listings across Airbnb, VRBO, and other channels

Communicate with homeowners professionally, sharing timely updates and insights



What We‚Äôre Looking For

2+ years experience in short-term rentals, hospitality, or vacation property support

Strong knowledge of PMS systems (Hostaway, Guesty) and tools like Slack, Breezeway, ClickUp

Great phone presence ‚Äì calm, confident, and guest-first attitude

Tech-savvy and organized ‚Äì able to create documents, templates, and manage systems independentl

Bonus: Experience with leasing coordination or familiarity with AI/chatbot tools



You‚Äôre a Fit If You Are:

Calm under pressure and quick-thinking in urgent guest scenarios

Detail-oriented and love documenting processes

Comfortable working with minimal supervision

A team player who thrives in fast-paced, remote environments

Open to weekend shifts and peak coverage hours



How To Apply:

We‚Äôre excited to hear from you! To apply for the position, please follow these steps:



Create a Video Submission (Max 5 Minutes)

Please record a short video (maximum of 5 minutes) answering the following questions:

Tell us about your experience and why you believe you‚Äôre a great fit for this role.

How would you handle a guest who is frustrated or upset about an issue during their stay?

What does great guest service mean to you?



Upload Your Video and Resume: Create a folder in Google Drive or Dropbox and upload both your video and your most updated resume. Ensure the folder is set to public so we can access the files.



Submit Your Application: Fill out the application form provided here. Be sure to include the link to your public folder in the form.ONLY THOSE WHO WILL FOLLOW THESE INSTRUCTIONS WILL BE CONSIDERED. THANK YOU!

title: Photo Editor
description:
We are seeking a skilled and detail-oriented Photo Editor to join our team. This role requires strong technical proficiency in Adobe Lightroom and the ability to transform RAW, flat images into vibrant, high-quality final products. The ideal candidate must be efficient, consistent, and capable of handling high-volume editing while maintaining professional standards.



Key Responsibilities



Edit and enhance high volumes of photos using Adobe Lightroom



Professionally color grade images to achieve vibrant, polished results



Create and process HDR photos with accurate exposure blending



Edit both HDR and standard images with consistent color, tone, and style



Take RAW, flat images and transform them into visually appealing, high-quality final images



Maintain brand consistency across all edited content



Organize and manage large batches of photos efficiently



Deliver completed projects within established deadlines



Performance Expectations



Ability to edit up to 500 burst photos per day while maintaining quality standards



Strong workflow management and efficiency in batch processing



High attention to detail and consistency across large photo sets



Required Skills & Qualifications



Proven experience as a Photo Editor



Advanced proficiency in Adobe Lightroom



Strong understanding of color correction, color grading, exposure balancing, and sharpening



Experience editing HDR photography



Ability to work with RAW image files and enhance flat images professionally



Strong time management and ability to meet high-volume deadlines



Portfolio demonstrating before-and-after editing examples



Preferred Qualifications



Experience in real estate, construction, lifestyle, or outdoor photography editing



Familiarity with additional Adobe Creative Suite tools (Photoshop is a plus)



What We‚Äôre Looking For



Fast but detail-focused



Creative eye for color and composition



Reliable and deadline-driven



Ability to follow editing guidelines and brand standards



If you are confident in your ability to handle high-volume editing while producing vibrant, professional-quality images, we‚Äôd love to see your portfolio.

title: Chief Marketing Officer
description:
Position Title: Chief Marketing Officer  (Real Estate Focus)

Hours: Up to 5 hours per week to start

Growth Path: Opportunity to grow into a full-time position

Industry: Real Estate Sales, Property Management, Brokerage ‚Äì Pennsylvania, USA



Who We Are



We are a growing real estate sales team, property management company, and brokerage serving Pennsylvania. Our mission is to serve people well, communicate clearly, and build long-term trust in our communities.



We are looking for a proactive, detail-oriented digital marketing professional who understands how to build visibility in today‚Äôs AI-driven world. This is not just about posting content. It‚Äôs about building digital authority that earns attention, builds trust, and generates opportunity.



We are starting with limited hours, but our goal is to grow this into a full-time position as results and systems scale.





Your Mission



Strengthen and expand our online presence so that:



* Our websites are optimized, professional, and high-performing

* Our social media reflects credibility and consistency

* Our brand is discoverable in AI-driven search environments

* Our digital footprint generates awareness, trust, and inbound opportunities



You will help us move from simply ‚Äúbeing online‚Äù to becoming a recognized authority in our local market.







Key Responsibilities



Website Development & Management



* Build, update, and manage company websites (sales team, property management, brokerage)

* Improve on-page SEO (titles, meta descriptions, keywords, internal linking)

* Implement structured data/schema markup for AI and search visibility

* Optimize site speed, mobile experience, and user flow

* Maintain brand consistency across all platforms

* Monitor analytics and recommend performance improvements



AI & Search Visibility Strategy



* Optimize content for AI search engines and generative search platforms

* Strengthen local SEO (Pennsylvania-focused)

* Structure content to improve authority and ranking

* Identify backlink and citation opportunities

* Track keyword and visibility improvements



Social Media Management



* Plan and schedule content across key platforms

* Maintain consistent branding and messaging

* Create simple branded graphics (Canva or similar tools)

* Increase engagement and visibility

* Align content with listings, client wins, and company growth



Brand Growth & Reputation



* Support online review strategy

* Ensure consistent listings across directories

* Recommend strategic digital initiatives

* Provide a monthly summary of completed work and measurable impact



---



What Success Looks Like



Within the first 90 days:



* Clear SEO foundation in place

* Stronger website structure and user experience

* Consistent social media presence

* Measurable improvements in local search visibility

* Clear reporting and growth direction



Long-term:



* Increased inbound opportunities

* Expanded digital authority

* Growth into a larger role with expanded hours





Qualifications



* Proven digital marketing experience (real estate or service-based businesses preferred)

* Strong understanding of SEO and local search optimization

* Familiarity with AI search visibility strategies

* Experience managing WordPress or similar platforms

* Social media management experience

* Basic graphic design skills (Canva or similar)

* Strong written English communication

* Organized, proactive, and self-managed

* Reliable internet connection

* At the end of subject line of your response, please write DME26.







Preferred



* Experience working with U.S.-based businesses

* Familiarity with Google Analytics, Search Console, and Meta Business Suite

* Experience implementing schema markup

* Basic paid advertising knowledge





Work Structure



* Up to 5 hours per week to start

* Flexible schedule with agreed deadlines

* Performance-based growth opportunity

* Goal of expanding into a full-time role as results scale



---



Compensation



Competitive hourly rate based on experience.

Paid weekly or bi-weekly (to be agreed upon).



---



Who You Are



You don‚Äôt just complete tasks ‚Äî you build systems.

You see opportunity where others see noise.

You understand how consistency compounds.

You are looking for more than short-term freelance work ‚Äî you want to grow with a company that is building something meaningful.





How to Apply



Please submit:



1. A brief introduction

2. Examples of websites you‚Äôve managed

3. Social media accounts you‚Äôve handled

4. A short explanation of how you would improve AI search visibility for a local real estate company

5. Your hourly rate



We are not looking for an agency. We are looking for a long-term partner who wants to help build something substantial ‚Äî and grow into a larger role over time.



If that sounds like you, we would love to connect.

title: HR Generalist (System Builder + People Partner)
description:
We're Hiring: HR Generalist (System Builder + People Partner)

Full-Time | Remote

Monday to Friday 

Php 30,000/month



About Progreda

We are a fast-growing SaaS agency that empowers business owners, marketing agencies, and virtual assistant teams through automation, systems, and full-service support. As we scale, we‚Äôre not just looking for people who can do the job; we‚Äôre looking for leaders who can build better ways to work.



We are hiring our first dedicated HR Generalist to lay the foundation of our HR systems, processes, and structure. We don‚Äôt have a fully developed HR department yet, so this role is ideal for someone who‚Äôs not only experienced but also excited to create, implement, and improve everything from scratch.



Key Responsibilities:

As our HR Generalist, you will take on a wide range of HR tasks that ensure our internal operations run smoothly and our people feel supported and empowered. You‚Äôll report directly to company leadership and work closely with multiple departments to:



???? Recruitment & Onboarding

- Coordinate the full recruitment process, from posting job ads to screening, interviews, and hiring

- Set up onboarding documents, welcome kits, and systems for new hires

- Schedule training sessions and support new hire integration



???? Employee Records & Compliance

- Maintain up-to-date employee records and databases (contracts, evaluations, leaves, etc.)

- Ensure compliance with labor laws and internal policies

- Handle documentation for any internal audits or policy updates



???? Employee Relations

- Act as the first point of contact for HR-related questions or concerns

- Handle conflict resolution and disciplinary procedures with professionalism and confidentiality

- Promote a positive, inclusive, and collaborative company culture



???? Performance, Payroll & Admin Support

- Handle time tracking, attendance monitoring, and payroll coordination

- Handle employee evaluations, probationary reviews, and performance improvement plans

- Implement engagement surveys, recognition programs, and company events



???? HR Projects & Culture Building

- Design and roll out new HR initiatives, including SOPs, employee handbooks, and training

- Support leadership in building an HR structure that scales as the company grows



What We‚Äôre Looking For

We‚Äôre not looking for someone who just wants to follow instructions; we need someone who can think independently, lead with empathy, and build from a blank canvas. The ideal candidate is:

- An experienced HR Generalist with 2+ years of relevant experience

- Strong in the labor laws and HR compliance

- Proactive in setting up systems, not just maintaining them

- Tech-savvy and familiar with HRIS tools, Google Workspace, spreadsheets

- Comfortable managing people issues with confidentiality, integrity, and care

- A strong communicator‚Äîboth written and verbal

- Excited to help build something meaningful from the ground up



Why Join Us?

- You‚Äôll build your own department and leave your mark on a growing company

- Work remotely

- Learn and grow alongside a team that values ownership and initiative

- Be part of a purpose-driven team that‚Äôs empowering businesses and creating jobs globally

- Career growth and leadership opportunities as the company expands



How to Apply

If this sounds like the challenge you‚Äôve been waiting for, we‚Äôd love to hear from you!

Please send your resume and a brief intro video or cover letter explaining:

- Why are you the right person to build our HR systems?

- What excites you about this role and working with us?

title: Customer Support Specialist ‚Äì Full-Time (Remote)
description:
At Glammatic, we help salon and spa owners harness the power of technology and AI to grow their businesses ‚Äî without needing to be tech experts. Through our platform and services, we support websites, SEO, Google Business optimization, social media, and AI-powered communications ‚Äî all designed specifically for the beauty industry. We currently support 400+ salons and beauty businesses across the U.S., and as we continue to scale, we‚Äôre focused on delivering exceptional client experiences at every touchpoint. Our mission is simple: empower beauty entrepreneurs to thrive in the digital world.



Role at a Glance



We‚Äôre looking for a Customer Support Specialist who is experienced, proactive, and passionate about helping salon and spa owners succeed online.



In this role, you‚Äôll be on the frontlines of the Glammatic client experience ‚Äî managing
 tickets, inbound and outbound phone calls, live chats, and text support. You‚Äôll also assist with payment follow-ups and contribute to both internal and client-facing projects.



This is an opportunity to join a growing, fast-paced team where your communication skills, ownership mindset, and attention to detail will directly impact client satisfaction and retention.



Key Responsibilities



-- Respond to customer requests and inquiries via
, phone, live chat, and text

-- Handle inbound and outbound calls, including failed payment outreach

-- Triage and resolve support tickets with efficiency and empathy

-- Collaborate closely with the Customer Success, Sales, and Technical Support teams

-- Write, edit, and maintain help articles and internal documentation

-- Recommend and implement process improvements to enhance the customer experience



Core Competencies



-- Fluent in spoken and written English

-- Excellent written and verbal communication skills (you‚Äôll be interacting with customers daily)

-- 3+ years of experience in technical support

-- 4+ years of customer support experience

-- Strong work ethic, ownership mindset, and adaptability in a fast-paced startup environment

-- Comfortable using a variety of software tools and web-based platforms



Bonus: Experience working with small business clients (salons, restaurants, retail, etc.)

Bonus: Familiarity with tools like Zendesk, Front, Slack, 
 or other shared inbox/ticketing platforms



If you're passionate about supporting small businesses, love solving problems, and are excited to be part of a fast-moving team ‚Äî we‚Äôd love to hear from you!

title: Content Feedback Manager (Giving Feedback): $1,000‚Äì$1,200 USD START RATE
description:

Paid every two weeks via Wise.



ABOUT US







Young Publisher is an international digital marketing company working with content creators and online brands.



BENEFITS

- Full-time position: 8 hours daily, Monday-Friday; 40 hours a week

- Quality-control content ideas created by our Content Research Experts before delivery to the client, ensuring fit with niche, experience, and likely performance

Progress Tracking

- Attend daily tea
eting (mandatory, 3pm CET)

- Keep internal feedback and client progress records up to date



REQUIREMENTS (MUST-HAVE)

- C1+ English (written), with perfect grammar and clear, professional responses

- Significant experience creating or reviewing short-form content for Instagram Reels, TikTok, or YouTube Shorts

- Organized and detail-oriented

- Reliable internet and a quiet, professional home workspace

- Accountability mindset and deadline commitment

- Long-term commitment, eager to master a workflow and have direct impact on client success

- Have a professional background

- Wear business-casual attire

- Experience supporting creators and social media beginners, especially ages 45+

- Familiarity with AI tools like ChatGPT, CapCut, etc.

- Strong understanding of trends/strategy for Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube Shorts



WHY JOIN US?



- Start rate: $800 a month + performance-based bonuses (TOTAL: $1,000‚Äì$1,200 a month once trained)

- Performance bonuses: Up to $400+ additional monthly based on:

- Quality and clarity of feedback

- Task completion and consistency

- Professional growth: Frequent feedback and advanced training



HOW TO APPLY

- Help clients overcome content blocks and limiting beliefs



Progress Tracking:



- Update daily/weekly reports

- Track client progress and next steps

- Join daily team check-ins

- Ensure clients follow strategies consistently



REQUIREMENTS (MUST-HAVE)



- C1+ English (written and spoken) with no accent

- Strong communication skills

- Organized and detail-oriented

- Reliable internet and a quiet workspace

- Accountability mindset and deadline commitment



IMPORTANT



When recording a Loom video as part of your application:



- Camera must show your FACE & SCREEN

- Treat it as a LIVE interview with the Hiring Manager

- Have a professional background

- Have clear audio

- Wear business-casual attire



BONUS SKILLS (NOT REQUIRED)



- Content creation and social media experience

- Knowledge of Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube Shorts

- Regular usage of AI tools (ChatGPT, CapCut)



WHY JOIN US?



- Start rate: $935 a month + performance-based bonuses (TOTAL: $1,100 a month)

Note: More experienced CSMs earn between $1,800 and $2,500 after 6-12 months.

- Performance bonuses: Up to $900+ additional monthly based on:

- Client retention rates

- Task completion metrics

- Quality of feedback

- Team collaboration

- Payments: Twice per month via Wise directly to your bank

- Tools access: We'll cover all the needed tools

- Work-life balance: No graveyard shifts

- Professional growth: Regular feedback and skill development



HOW TO APPLY



1: Message us on OnlineJobs.ph with "CSM" as the message title



2: Include ONLY the following in your message:



#1: Your CV.

#2: Your years of experience with short-form content.

#3: Your years of experience with client management.

#4: One sentence on why you're a good fit for this role.

#5: Your portfolio.



Note: Messages that do not follow this format will NOT be reviewed.

title: Senior Virtual Assistant ‚Äì Property Management
description:
Senior Virtual Assistant ‚Äì Property Management



Part-Time (Weekend Trial) Full-Time Opportunity



Location: Remote (Philippines preferred)

Schedule (Trial Period): Saturday & Sunday | 1:00 PM ‚Äì 8:00 PM EST

Trial Length: 1 Month

Growth: Full-Time Role Available After Successful Trial

Industry: U.S. Residential Property Management



About Us



We are a U.S.-based residential property management company managing multi-unit properties in Massachusetts. We operate with strong systems, strict organization, and high standards for communication, compliance, and financial accuracy.



We are seeking a Senior-Level Virtual Assistant with real U.S. property management experience.



This is not an entry-level role.



The position will begin as a weekend trial (Saturday & Sunday, 1‚Äì8 PM EST) with the intention of transitioning into a full-time position for the right candidate.



Role Overview



You will support high-level property management operations including:



Tenant communications



Lease renewals & documentation



Maintenance coordination



Vendor follow-ups



Rent tracking & ledger review



Compliance documentation



Systems & reporting management



You must be able to operate independently and handle responsibility with minimal supervision.



Required Experience (Non-Negotiable)



3+ years working as a VA in U.S. property management



Strong working knowledge of Buildium (or AppFolio)



Experience with:



Lease renewals



Move-ins & move-outs



Security deposit processing



Maintenance coordination



Vendor quote comparison



Rent ledgers & reconciliation



Excellent written English



Highly detail-oriented and process-driven



Responsibilities

Tenant & Lease Administration



Draft and send renewals and addenda



Track expirations and follow-ups



Organize compliance documents



Maintain accurate tenant files



Maintenance Management



Create and monitor work orders



Follow up with vendors for scheduling & pricing



Confirm job completion with photos



Track repeat issues



Financial & Admin Support



Review and post payments



Track voucher statements



Assist with expense categorization



Support reconciliations



Systems & Reporting



Maintain Google Sheets trackers



Update task boards



Organize Drive folders



Provide clear daily summaries during shift



Who This Role Is For



You are:



Extremely organized



Proactive (you follow up without being reminded)



Comfortable making decisions



Strong with documentation



Calm under pressure



Interested in long-term growth



Requirements



Stable high-speed internet



Quiet workspace



Backup power/internet preferred



Available consistently Saturdays & Sundays, 1‚Äì8 PM EST



Growth Opportunity



This role begins as a 1-month weekend trial.



If performance, communication, and systems management meet expectations, this will transition into a full-time long-term position.



We are looking for someone who wants stability and growth.



How to Apply



Please include:



A short introduction (not generic)



Your property management experience (specific tasks you handled)



Software you‚Äôve used (be specific)



Your desired hourly or monthly rate (USD)



The word ‚ÄúWEEKEND PM‚Äù in your subject line



Bonus: Describe one difficult tenant or maintenance situation you handled and how you resolved it.

title: Virtual Assistant Go High level Exp
description:
### **GAPP Homecare Virtual Assistant (Medicaid/GAMMIS Experience Required)**



We are seeking a reliable **Virtual Assistant** to support a Georgia-based GAPP homecare agency. This role focuses on **GAMMIS documentation, GAPP intake support, and administrative coordination**.



**Responsibilities:**



* Upload and manage documents in **GAMMIS**

* Assist with **GAPP intakes, renewals, and tracking**

* Maintain client and nurse records

* Follow up on missing documentation

* Communicate with families, nurses, and staff



**Requirements:**



* Experience with **GAPP, Medicaid, or homecare**

* Familiarity with **GAMMIS** preferred

* Strong organization and attention to detail

* Excellent communication skills

* HIPAA-compliant and dependable



**Details:**



* Remote

* Part-time or full-time

* Long-term opportunity



**To apply:**

Please include your experience with GAPP, GAMMIS, or Medicaid homecare.
